<artifactId>maven-source-plugin</artifactId> <configuration> <attach>true</attach> </configuration> <executions> <execution> <!-- Âú®ÂØπÂ∫îÁîüÂëΩÂë®ÊúüÔºàÈò∂ÊÆµÔºâËß¶Âèë --> <phase>compile</phase> <goals> <!-- ÁõÆÊ†á‰∏∫jar: http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-source-plugin/ --> <goal>jar</goal> </goals> </execution> </executions></plugin> Áõ∏ÂÖ≥Â∏∏ËßÅÈóÆÈ¢òsnapshot ‰∏ãËΩΩmaven ÈªòËÆ§‰∏ç‰ºö‰∏ãËΩΩ snapshot ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Âú® setting.xml ÈÖçÁΩÆÂ¶Ç‰∏ãprofile„ÄÇ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><settings> <!-- ÁßÅÊúç --> <localRepository>/users/username/.m2/maven_repository</localRepository> <mirrors> <mirror> <id>nexus</id> <name>xinheyun nexus</name> <url>http://192.168.1.1:8761/repository/maven-public/</url> <mirrorOf>*</mirrorOf> </mirror> </mirrors> <profiles> <profile> <id>nexus</id> <repositories> <repository> <id>central</id> <name>Nexus</name> <url>http://192.168.1.1:8761/repository/maven-public/</url> <releases> <enabled>true</enabled> </releases> <snapshots> <enabled>true</enabled> </snapshots> </repository> </repositories> <pluginRepositories> <pluginRepository> <id>central</id> <name>Nexus</name> <url>http://192.168.1.1:8761/repository/maven-public/</url> <releases> <enabled>true</enabled> </releases> <snapshots> <enabled>true</enabled> </snapshots> </pluginRepository> </pluginRepositories> </profile> </profiles> <!-- ÈÖçÁΩÆÁîüÊïà profile --> <activeProfiles> <activeProfile>nexus</activeProfile> </activeProfiles></settings> ÂÆâË£ÖÊú¨Âú∞ jarËøôÈáå‰ª• OracleÈ©±Âä® ‰∏∫‰æãÔºå‰ªãÁªç‰∏Ä‰∏ãÂ¶Ç‰ΩïÂ∞Ü jar ÂåÖÂà∞Êú¨Âú∞‰ªìÂ∫ì„ÄÇ Âõ†‰∏∫ÁâàÊùÉÈóÆÈ¢òÔºå‰∏ÄËà¨ÂºÄÊ∫ê‰ªìÂ∫ì‰∏ç‰ºöÊã•Êúâ Oracle ÁöÑÈ©±Âä®„ÄÇ È¶ñÂÖàËé∑ÂèñÈ©±Âä® app\gushi\product\11.2.0\dbhome_1\jdbc\lib\ojdbc6.jar „ÄÇÂëΩ‰ª§ËßÑÂàôÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö 123456ÂÆâË£ÖÊåáÂÆöÊñá‰ª∂Âà∞Êú¨Âú∞‰ªìÂ∫ìÂëΩ‰ª§Ôºömvn install:install-file-DgroupId=<groupId> : ËÆæÁΩÆÈ°πÁõÆ‰ª£Á†ÅÁöÑÂåÖÂêç(‰∏ÄËà¨Áî®ÁªÑÁªáÂêç)-DartifactId=<artifactId> : ËÆæÁΩÆÈ°πÁõÆÂêçÊàñÊ®°ÂùóÂêç -Dversion=1.0.0 : ÁâàÊú¨Âè∑-Dpackaging=jar : ‰ªÄ‰πàÁ±ªÂûãÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂(jarÂåÖ)-Dfile=<myfile.jar> : ÊåáÂÆöjarÊñá‰ª∂Ë∑ØÂæÑ‰∏éÊñá‰ª∂Âêç(ÂêåÁõÆÂΩïÂè™ÈúÄÊñá‰ª∂Âêç) Ëß£Âéã jar ÂåÖ ÂèØ‰ª•Á°ÆÈ©±Âä®ÁâàÊú¨ÔºåÂ¶Ç 11.2.0.1.0 „ÄÇ 1$ mvn install:install-file -DgroupId=com.oracle -DartifactId=ojdbc6 -Dversion=11.2.0.1.0 -Dpackaging=jar -Dfile=ojdbc6.jar BUILD SUCCESS ÂêéÔºåÂç≥ÂèØ‰ΩøÁî®‰æùËµñ„ÄÇ 12345<dependency> <groupId>com.oracle</groupId> <artifactId>ojdbc6</artifactId> <version>11.2.0.1.0</version></dependency> ÊâìÂåÖË∑≥ËøáÊµãËØï‰ªé build ÁîüÂëΩÂë®ÊúüÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂá∫ÔºåÈªòËÆ§ package ÂâçÔºå‰∏ÄÂÆö‰ºöÊâßË°å test „ÄÇÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî®‰ª•‰∏ãÂëΩ‰ª§Ë∑≥Ëøá Ôºö 12# Êé®Ëçê - ‰∏çÊâßË°åÊµãËØïÁî®‰æãÔºå‰πü‰∏çÁºñËØëÊµãËØïÁî®‰æãÁ±ª$ mvn package -Dmaven.test.skip=true 12# ‰∏çÊâßË°åÊµãËØïÁî®‰æãÔºå‰ΩÜÁºñËØëÊµãËØïÁî®‰æãÁ±ªÁîüÊàêÁõ∏Â∫îÁöÑclassÊñá‰ª∂Ëá≥target/test-classes‰∏ã$ mvn package -DskipTests

entry.title: ÊµÖË∞àGit
entry.content: Git ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂºÄÊ∫êÁöÑÂàÜÂ∏ÉÂºèÁâàÊú¨ÊéßÂà∂Á≥ªÁªüÔºàVCSÔºâÔºå‰πüÊòØ‰∏™ÂÜÖÂÆπÁÆ°ÁêÜÁ≥ªÁªü(CMS)ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•È´òÊïàÂú∞Â§ÑÁêÜÂêÑÁßçÈ°πÁõÆ„ÄÇ ÂÆòÁΩëÔºö Git Pro Git ‰ª•‰∏ãÊòØ Git ÁöÑÂü∫Êú¨ÂëΩ‰ª§ÂíåÂØπÂ∫îÊìç‰ΩúÂÜÖÂÆπÁöÑÁ§∫ÊÑèÂõæÔºö ÂüüÊñ∞Âª∫ÁöÑ‰∏Ä‰∏™ gitÈ°πÁõÆÔºå‰ºöÂú®È°πÁõÆÊ†πÁõÆÂΩï‰∏ãÂàõÂª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈöêËóèÁöÑ .git ÁõÆÂΩïÔºåÁî®‰∫éÂ≠òÊîæ git ÊâÄÈúÄ‰ø°ÊÅØ„ÄÇÂΩìÊàë‰ª¨ÂèòÊõ¥È°πÁõÆÊñá‰ª∂Êó∂ÊòØ‰∏ç‰ºöÁõ¥Êé•‰ΩúÁî®‰∫é git ÁöÑÔºåÈúÄË¶ÅÁõ∏ÂÖ≥ÂëΩ‰ª§ÊâçËÉΩËß¶ÂèëÁõ∏Â∫îÊìç‰Ωú„ÄÇ‰∏ÄËà¨‰πüÂ∞Ü .git ÁõÆÂΩï Áß∞‰πã‰∏∫ ÁâàÊú¨Â∫ì„ÄÇ Âüü ËØ¥Êòé Remote ËøúÁ®ã‰ªìÂ∫ì„ÄÇ Repository ‰ªìÂ∫ìÂå∫ÔºàÊàñÊú¨Âú∞‰ªìÂ∫ìÔºâÔºåÂ≠ò‰∫é .git ÁõÆÂΩï „ÄÇ Index / Stage ÊöÇÂ≠òÂå∫ÔºåÂç≥ÁºìÂ≠òÔºåÂ≠ò‰∫é .git/index Êñá‰ª∂„ÄÇ Workspace Â∑•‰ΩúÂå∫ÔºåÂèØËßÜÁöÑÔºåÁõ¥Êé•Êìç‰ΩúÁöÑÁõÆÂΩï„ÄÇ Â∏∏Áî®Êìç‰Ωú12# Êü•ÁúãÂ∏ÆÂä©$ git help Êìç‰ΩúÂëΩ‰ª§ ËØ¥Êòé git clone ÂÖãÈöÜËøúÁ®ã‰ªìÂ∫ìÂà∞Êú¨Âú∞ÔºåÂåÖÊã¨‰∫ÜÂ∑•‰ΩúÂå∫ÂíåÁâàÊú¨Â∫ì „ÄÇ git pull ÊãâÂèñËøúÁ®ã‰ªìÂ∫ìÂà∞Êú¨Âú∞ÔºåÂπ∂ÂêàÂπ∂„ÄÇÁõ∏ÂΩì‰∫é git fetch + git merge „ÄÇ git add Ê∑ªÂä†ÂèòÂä®Âà∞ÊöÇÂ≠òÂå∫„ÄÇ git commit Êèê‰∫§ÂèòÂä®Âà∞Êú¨Âú∞‰ªìÂ∫ì„ÄÇ git push ÂèëÂ∏É(publish)Âà∞ËøúÁ®ã‰ªìÂ∫ì„ÄÇ git checkout ÂàáÊç¢ÂàÜÊîØ„ÄÇgit checkout ÂâçÔºåÁ°Æ‰øùÂ∑≤ git commit „ÄÇ git merge ÂêàÂπ∂ÂàÜÊîØ„ÄÇ git ÁöÑÈÉ®ÂàÜÂëΩ‰ª§ÂèØËÉΩ‰ºöË∞ÉÁî® vim ÊñáÊú¨ÁºñËæëÂô®ÔºåËøôÈáåÂàó‰∏æ‰∏Ä‰∫õÂ∏∏Áî®Êìç‰ΩúÔºö vim Ê∂âÂèä ËØ¥Êòé / ËæìÂÖ•Â≠óÁ¨¶Âç≥ÂèØÊü•ËØ¢„ÄÇËæìÂÖ•n Êü•Áúã‰∏ã‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂåπÈÖçÈ°π„ÄÇ i ÂàáÊç¢ÂÖâÊ†á‰∏∫ËæìÂÖ•/ÊõøÊç¢Ê®°ÂºèÔºåÂÖâÊ†áÂ∞ÜÂèòÊàêÁ´ñÁ∫ø/‰∏ãÂàíÁ∫ø„ÄÇ Esc ÈÄÄÂá∫ÂΩìÂâçÊ®°Âºè„ÄÇ shift + : ËøõÂÖ•Â∫ïÁ∫øÂëΩ‰ª§Ê®°Âºè„ÄÇÊ≠§Êó∂ q ‰∏∫ÈÄÄÂá∫Ôºå w ‰∏∫‰øùÂ≠òÔºå! ‰∏∫Âº∫Âà∂ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Âè†Âä†„ÄÇ Ëé∑ÂèñÂíåÂàùÂßãÂåñÈ°πÁõÆgit init1234# Âú®ÂΩìÂâçÁõÆÂΩïÊñ∞Âª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™Git‰ª£Á†ÅÂ∫ì$ mkdir hellow-world$ cd hellow-world$ git init 12# Êñ∞Âª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁõÆÂΩïÔºåÂ∞ÜÂÖ∂ÂàùÂßãÂåñ‰∏∫Git‰ª£Á†ÅÂ∫ì$ git init <project-name> git clone12# ‰∏ãËΩΩÈ°πÁõÆÂíåÈªòËÆ§ÂàÜÊîØÁöÑ‰ª£Á†ÅÂéÜÂè≤$ git clone git@github.com:username/hello-world.git Âü∫Êú¨Âø´ÁÖßGit ÁöÑÂ∑•‰ΩúÂ∞±ÊòØÂàõÂª∫Âíå‰øùÂ≠ò‰Ω†È°πÁõÆÁöÑÂø´ÁÖßÂèä‰∏é‰πãÂêéÁöÑÂø´ÁÖßËøõË°åÂØπÊØî„ÄÇËøôÈáåÂ∞ÜÂØπÊìç‰ΩúÈ°πÁõÆÂø´ÁÖßÁöÑÂëΩ‰ª§‰Ωú‰ªãÁªç„ÄÇ git add1234567# Êñ∞Âª∫Êñá‰ª∂$ touch README.md# Ê∑ªÂä†ÊåáÂÆöÁõÆÂΩïÂà∞ÊöÇÂ≠òÂå∫ÔºåÂåÖÊã¨Â≠êÁõÆÂΩïÔºö$ git add <dir># Ê∑ªÂä†ÊåáÂÆöÊñá‰ª∂Âà∞ÊöÇÂ≠òÂå∫Ôºö$ git add <file1> [file2] ...# Ê∑ªÂä†ÂΩìÂâçÁõÆÂΩïÁöÑÊâÄÊúâÊñá‰ª∂Âà∞ÊöÇÂ≠òÂå∫$ git add . git status12# ÊòæÁ§∫ÊúâÂèòÊõ¥ÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂Áä∂ÊÄÅÔºàÊú™commitÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂Ôºâ$ git status git diff12# ÊòæÁ§∫ÊöÇÂ≠òÂå∫‰∏éÂ∑•‰ΩúÂå∫ÁöÑÂ∑ÆÂºÇ(Âè™ÈíàÂØπÊöÇÂ≠òÂå∫Â∑≤Â≠òÂú®ÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂)$ git diff git commit12# Êèê‰∫§ÊöÇÂ≠òÂå∫Âà∞‰ªìÂ∫ìÂå∫$ git commit -m <message> 12# ‰ΩøÁî®‰∏ÄÊ¨°Êñ∞ÁöÑcommitÔºåÊõø‰ª£‰∏ä‰∏ÄÊ¨°Êèê‰∫§$ git commit --amend -m <message> git reset123# ÈáçÁΩÆÊöÇÂ≠òÂå∫‰∏éÂ∑•‰ΩúÂå∫Ôºå‰∏é‰∏ä‰∏ÄÊ¨°commit‰øùÊåÅ‰∏ÄËá¥# (Â∑•‰ΩúÂå∫Êñ∞Â¢ûÊñá‰ª∂Ôºå‰∏îÊ≤°ÊúâÂä†ÂÖ•ÊöÇÂ≠òÂå∫Âàô‰∏ç‰ºöÂèòÂä®)$ git reset --hard 12345# ÈáçÁΩÆÂΩìÂâçÂàÜÊîØÁöÑÊåáÈíà‰∏∫ÊåáÂÆöcommitÔºåÂêåÊó∂ÈáçÁΩÆÊöÇÂ≠òÂå∫Ôºå‰ΩÜÂ∑•‰ΩúÂå∫‰∏çÂèò$ git reset <commit-hash># ÈáçÁΩÆÂΩìÂâçÂàÜÊîØÁöÑHEAD‰∏∫ÊåáÂÆöcommitÔºåÂêåÊó∂ÈáçÁΩÆÊöÇÂ≠òÂå∫ÂíåÂ∑•‰ΩúÂå∫Ôºå‰∏éÊåáÂÆöcommit‰∏ÄËá¥$ git reset --hard <commit-hash> git rm / git mv12# Âà†Èô§Â∑•‰ΩúÂå∫Êñá‰ª∂ÔºåÂπ∂‰∏îÂ∞ÜËøôÊ¨°Âà†Èô§ÊîæÂÖ•ÊöÇÂ≠òÂå∫$ git rm <file1> [file2] ... 12# ÈáçÂëΩÂêçÊñá‰ª∂ÔºåÂπ∂‰∏îÂ∞ÜËøô‰∏™ÊîπÂêçÊîæÂÖ•ÊöÇÂ≠òÂå∫$ git mv <source> <dest> ÂÖ±‰∫´ÂíåÊõ¥Êñ∞È°πÁõÆgit remote Â¶ÇÊûúÈ°πÁõÆÊòØ git clone ‰∏ãÊù•ÁöÑ‰ºöËá™Â∏¶ËøûÊé•ÁöÑËøúÁ®ã‰ªìÂ∫ì„ÄÇ 12# ‰∏∫Êú¨Âú∞‰ªìÂ∫ìËÆæÁΩÆËøúÁ®ã‰ªìÂ∫ìorigin$ git remote add origin <url> git fetch12# ‰∏ãËΩΩËøúÁ®ã‰ªìÂ∫ìÁöÑÊâÄÊúâÂèòÂä®$ git fetch <url> git pull git pull Áõ∏ÂΩì‰∫é git fetch + git merge „ÄÇ 12# ÊãâÂèñËøúÁ®ã‰ªìÂ∫ìÁöÑÂèòÂåñÔºåÂπ∂‰∏éÊú¨Âú∞ÂΩìÂâçÂàÜÊîØÂêàÂπ∂$ git pull git push HEAD ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Ê∏∏Ê†áÔºå‰∏ÄËà¨Ë°®Á§∫ÂΩìÂâçÂàÜÊîØ„ÄÇ 123456# Êé®ÈÄÅÂΩìÂâçÊú¨Âú∞ÂàÜÊîØÂà∞ËøúÁ®ã‰ªìÂ∫ì$ git push# Êé®ÈÄÅÊú¨Âú∞ÂàÜÊîØÂà∞ËøúÁ®ã‰ªìÂ∫ìorigin : $ git push -u origin <branch-name># Êé®ÈÄÅÂΩìÂâçÊú¨Âú∞ÂàÜÊîØÂà∞ËøúÁ®ã‰ªìÂ∫ìorigin$ git push -u origin HEAD 12345# Êé®ÈÄÅÊâÄÊúâÂàÜÊîØÂà∞ËøúÁ®ã‰ªìÂ∫ì$ git push --all# Âº∫Ë°åÊé®ÈÄÅÂΩìÂâçÂàÜÊîØÂà∞ËøúÁ®ã‰ªìÂ∫ìÔºåÂç≥‰ΩøÊúâÂÜ≤Á™Å$ git push --force ÂàÜÊîØÂíåÂêàÂπ∂‰ΩøÁî®ÂàÜÊîØÊÑèÂë≥ÁùÄ‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•‰ªéÂºÄÂèë‰∏ªÁ∫ø‰∏äÂàÜÁ¶ªÂºÄÊù•ÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂú®‰∏çÂΩ±Âìç‰∏ªÁ∫øÁöÑÂêåÊó∂ÁªßÁª≠Â∑•‰Ωú„ÄÇ git branch12345678910# ÂàóÂá∫ÊâÄÊúâËøúÁ®ãÂàÜÊîØÔºö$ git branch -r# ÂàóÂá∫ÊâÄÊúâÊú¨Âú∞ÂàÜÊîØÂíåËøúÁ®ãÂàÜÊîØÔºö$ git branch -a# ÂàóÂá∫ÊâÄÊúâÊú¨Âú∞ÂàÜÊîØ$ git branch# Êñ∞Âª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂàÜÊîØÔºå‰ª•ÂΩìÂâçÂàÜÊîØÂíåÊúÄÊñ∞ commit ‰∏∫Âü∫Á°Ä$ git branch <branch-name># Âà†Èô§ÂàÜÊîØ$ git branch -d <branch-name> 12# Êñ∞Âª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂàÜÊîØÔºåÊåáÂêëÊåáÂÆöcommit$ git branch <branch-name> [commit-hash] git checkoutgit checkout ÊòØ‰∏™ÂæàÂç±Èô©ÁöÑÂëΩ‰ª§Ôºå‰∏çÁÆ°ÊòØÂàáÊç¢ÂàÜÊîØÊàñÊñá‰ª∂ÔºåËØ∑Á°Æ‰øùÂ∑≤ commit ÔºåÂê¶ÂàôÂèØËÉΩ‰ºö‰∏¢Â§±Êñá‰ª∂ËÆ∞ÂΩïÁ≠â„ÄÇ ÂΩì‰∏§‰∏™ÂàÜÊîØÁöÑÊúÄÊñ∞ commit ÁöÑÊï£ÂàóÁ†Å‰∏çÁõ∏ÂêåÊó∂ÔºåËã•Â≠òÂú®Êú™ commit Êñá‰ª∂Ôºåcheout Êó∂‰ºöÂ§±Ë¥•Âπ∂ÊèêÁ§∫Ôºõ ÂΩì‰∏§‰∏™ÂàÜÊîØÁöÑÊúÄÊñ∞ commit ÁöÑÊï£ÂàóÁ†ÅÁõ∏ÂêåÊó∂Ôºåcheout Êó∂ÔºåÊú™ commit ÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂‰ºöÂ∏¶ÂÖ•ÂΩìÂè¶‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂàÜÊîØ‰∏≠„ÄÇ 12345# ÂàáÊç¢Âà∞ÊåáÂÆöÂàÜÊîØÔºåÂπ∂Êõ¥Êñ∞Â∑•‰ΩúÂå∫$ git checkout <branch-name># ÂàáÊç¢Âà∞‰∏ä‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂàÜÊîØ$ git checkout - 12# Êñ∞Âª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™ÂàÜÊîØÔºåÂπ∂ÂàáÊç¢Âà∞ËØ•ÂàÜÊîØ$ git checkout -b <branch-name> git merge12# ÂêàÂπ∂ÊåáÂÆöÂàÜÊîØÂà∞ÂΩìÂâçÂàÜÊîØ$ git merge <branch-name> git log12345678# ÊòæÁ§∫ÂΩìÂâçÂàÜÊîØÁöÑcommitÂéÜÂè≤$ git log# ÂéÜÂè≤ËÆ∞ÂΩïÁöÑÁÆÄÊ¥ÅÁöÑÁâàÊú¨$ git log --oneline# ÊòæÁ§∫commitÂéÜÂè≤Ôºå‰ª•ÂèäÂèòÊõ¥ÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπ$ git log --stat 1234567# Â±ïÁ§∫ÂΩìÂâçÁâàÊú¨Ê†ëgit log --graph# Â±ïÁ§∫ÊâÄÊúâÁâàÊú¨Ê†ëgit log --graph --all# ÊòæÁ§∫ÊåáÂÆöÊñá‰ª∂Áõ∏ÂÖ≥ÁöÑÊØè‰∏ÄÊ¨°diff$ git log -p <file> git tagÂ¶ÇÊûú‰Ω†ËææÂà∞‰∏Ä‰∏™ÈáçË¶ÅÁöÑÈò∂ÊÆµÔºåÂπ∂Â∏åÊúõÊ∞∏ËøúËÆ∞‰ΩèËøô‰∏™ÁâπÂà´ÁöÑÊèê‰∫§Âø´ÁÖßÔºå‰Ω†ÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî® git tag ÁªôÂÆÉÊâì‰∏äÊ†áÁ≠æ„ÄÇ 1234567# ‰ªÖÊ∑ªÂä†Ê†áÁ≠æÔºö$ git tag <tag-name># Ê∑ªÂä†Ê†áÁ≠æÔºåÂπ∂Ë¶ÅÊ±ÇÊ≥®Èáä$ git tag -a <tag-name># Â∏¶tagÁöÑcommitËÆ∞ÂΩï$ git log --decorate Â∏∏Áî®ÂºÄÂèëÊñπÊ°à .gitignoreÂú® .gitignore Êñá‰ª∂‰∏≠ÈÖçÁΩÆÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂‰∏ç‰ºöË¢´ Git ÁÆ°ÁêÜ„ÄÇ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334*.class# package file*.war*.ear# kdiff3 ignore*.orig# maven ignoretarget/# idea.idea//idea/*.ipr*.iml*.iws# eclipse ignore.settings/.project.classpatch# temp file*.log*.cache*.diff*.patch*.tmp# system ignore.DS_StoreThumbs.db Â∏∏ËßÅÈóÆÈ¢òÂ§öË¥¶Âè∑ÈÖçÁΩÆ‰∏ÄËà¨‰∏™‰∫∫ÂíåÂ∑•‰ΩúÈúÄË¶Å‰ΩøÁî®‰∏çÂêåÁöÑ git Ë¥¶Âè∑„ÄÇËøôÈáå‰ΩøÁî®‰∏çÂêåÁöÑ ssh-key Êù•ÂØπÂ∫î‰∏çÂêåÁöÑ HostName „ÄÇ 12345678$ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "personal@mail.com"# ‰øÆÊîπÁßòÈí•ÁöÑÊñá‰ª∂Âêçid_rsa_personalid_rsa_personal.pub$ ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "work@mail.com"id_rsa_workid_rsa_work.pub Âõ†‰∏∫‰øÆÊîπ‰∫ÜÈªòËÆ§ÂêçÁß∞ÔºåÊâÄÊúâÈúÄË¶ÅÊâãÂä®Ê∑ªÂä†ÁßòÈí•„ÄÇ ÈÅøÂÖçÊØèÊ¨°ÈáçÂêØÂêéÈÉΩÈúÄË¶ÅÊâãÂä®Ê∑ªÂä†ÔºàMacÔºâ Ëá™Âä®Êìç‰Ωú(Â∫îÁî®Á®ãÂ∫è) -> ShellËÑöÊú¨ -> Ê∑ªÂä†‰ª•‰∏ãÂëΩ‰ª§ Áî®Êà∑‰∏éÁæ§ÁªÑ -> ÁôªÂΩïÈ°πÊ∑ªÂä† 12345$ ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa_personal$ ssh-add ~/.ssh/id_rsa_work# È™åËØÅ$ ssh-add -l Âú® ~/.ssh ‰∏ãÈÖçÁΩÆ config Êñá‰ª∂ 1234567891011Host githubHostName github.comPreferredAuthentications publickeyUser personalIdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_personalHost gitlabHostName gitlab.comPreferredAuthentications publickeyUser workIdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_work ÊµãËØïÈÖçÁΩÆÊòØÂê¶ÊàêÂäü 12$ ssh -T git@github.com$ ssh -T git@gitlab.com 12345678910# ÂèñÊ∂àÂÖ®Â±ÄÁî®Êà∑ÂêçÂíåÈÇÆÁÆ±$ git config --global --unset user.name$ git config --global --unset user.email# git‰ªìÂ∫ì‰∏≠ÂàÜÂà´ËÆæÁΩÆ$ git config user.name "personal"$ git config user.email "personal@mail.com"$ git config user.name "work"$ git config user.email "work@mail.com"

entry.title: ÈôÑÂΩï:ThymeleafË°®ËææÂºèÂÆûÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÂØπË±°
entry.content: Êú¨ÊñáÁî®‰∫éËÆ∞ÂΩï Thymeleaf‰∏≠ÁöÑË°®ËææÂºèÂÆûÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÂØπË±°ÔºåÂéüÊñáÂú∞ÂùÄÔºöÈôÑÂΩïBÔºöË°®ËææÂºèÂÆûÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÂØπË±° „ÄÇ ÊâßË°å‰ø°ÊÅØ #execInfoÔºöË°®ËææÂºèÂØπË±°ÔºåÊèê‰æõÊúâÂÖ≥Âú®ThymeleafÊ†áÂáÜË°®ËææÂºè‰∏≠Â§ÑÁêÜÁöÑÊ®°ÊùøÁöÑÊúâÁî®‰ø°ÊÅØ„ÄÇ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142/* * ====================================================================== * See javadoc API for class org.thymeleaf.expression.ExecutionInfo * ====================================================================== *//* * Return the name and mode of the 'leaf' template. This means the template * from where the events being processed were parsed. So if this piece of * code is not in the root template "A" but on a fragment being inserted * into "A" from another template called "B", this will return "B" as a * name, and B's mode as template mode. */${#execInfo.templateName}${#execInfo.templateMode}/* * Return the name and mode of the 'root' template. This means the template * that the template engine was originally asked to process. So if this * piece of code is not in the root template "A" but on a fragment being * inserted into "A" from another template called "B", this will still * return "A" and A's template mode. */${#execInfo.processedTemplateName}${#execInfo.processedTemplateMode}/* * Return the stacks (actually, List<String> or List<TemplateMode>) of * templates being processed. The first element will be the * 'processedTemplate' (the root one), the last one will be the 'leaf' * template, and in the middle all the fragments inserted in nested * manner to reach the leaf from the root will appear. */${#execInfo.templateNames}${#execInfo.templateModes}/* * Return the stack of templates being processed similarly (and in the * same order) to 'templateNames' and 'templateModes', but returning * a List<TemplateData> with the full template metadata. */${#execInfo.templateStack} Ê∂àÊÅØ #messagesÔºöÁî®‰∫éÂú®ÂèòÈáèË°®ËææÂºè‰∏≠Ëé∑ÂèñÂ§ñÈÉ®ÂåñÊ∂àÊÅØÁöÑÂÆûÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÊñπÊ≥ïÔºå‰∏é‰ΩøÁî®#{...}ËØ≠Ê≥ïËé∑ÂèñÂÆÉ‰ª¨ÁöÑÊñπÂºèÁõ∏Âêå„ÄÇ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233/* * ====================================================================== * See javadoc API for class org.thymeleaf.expression.Messages * ====================================================================== *//* * Obtain externalized messages. Can receive a single key, a key plus arguments, * or an array/list/set of keys (in which case it will return an array/list/set of * externalized messages). * If a message is not found, a default message (like '??msgKey??') is returned. */${#messages.msg('msgKey')}${#messages.msg('msgKey', param1)}${#messages.msg('msgKey', param1, param2)}${#messages.msg('msgKey', param1, param2, param3)}${#messages.msgWithParams('msgKey', new Object[] {param1, param2, param3, param4})}${#messages.arrayMsg(messageKeyArray)}${#messages.listMsg(messageKeyList)}${#messages.setMsg(messageKeySet)}/* * Obtain externalized messages or null. Null is returned instead of a default * message if a message for the specified key is not found. */${#messages.msgOrNull('msgKey')}${#messages.msgOrNull('msgKey', param1)}${#messages.msgOrNull('msgKey', param1, param2)}${#messages.msgOrNull('msgKey', param1, param2, param3)}${#messages.msgOrNullWithParams('msgKey', new Object[] {param1, param2, param3, param4})}${#messages.arrayMsgOrNull(messageKeyArray)}${#messages.listMsgOrNull(messageKeyList)}${#messages.setMsgOrNull(messageKeySet)} URI #urisÔºöÁî®‰∫éÂú®ThymeleafÊ†áÂáÜË°®ËææÂºè‰∏≠ÊâßË°åURI / URLÊìç‰ΩúÔºàÂ∞§ÂÖ∂ÊòØËΩ¨‰πâ/ËΩ¨‰πâÔºâÁöÑÂÆûÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÂØπË±°„ÄÇ 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637/* * ====================================================================== * See javadoc API for class org.thymeleaf.expression.Uris * ====================================================================== *//* * Escape/Unescape as a URI/URL path */${#uris.escapePath(uri)}${#uris.escapePath(uri, encoding)}${#uris.unescapePath(uri)}${#uris.unescapePath(uri, encoding)}/* * Escape/Unescape as a URI/URL path segment (between '/' symbols) */${#uris.escapePathSegment(uri)}${#uris.escapePathSegment(uri, encoding)}${#uris.unescapePathSegment(uri)}${#uris.unescapePathSegment(uri, encoding)}/* * Escape/Unescape as a Fragment Identifier (#frag) */${#uris.escapeFragmentId(uri)}${#uris.escapeFragmentId(uri, encoding)}${#uris.unescapeFragmentId(uri)}${#uris.unescapeFragmentId(uri, encoding)}/* * Escape/Unescape as a Query Parameter (?var=value) */${#uris.escapeQueryParam(uri)}${#uris.escapeQueryParam(uri, encoding)}${#uris.unescapeQueryParam(uri)}${#uris.unescapeQueryParam(uri, encoding)} ËΩ¨Êç¢ #conversionsÔºöÂÖÅËÆ∏Âú®Ê®°ÊùøÁöÑ‰ªª‰Ωï‰ΩçÁΩÆÊâßË°åËΩ¨Êç¢ÊúçÂä°ÁöÑÂÆûÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÂØπË±°Ôºö 123456789101112/* * ====================================================================== * See javadoc API for class org.thymeleaf.expression.Conversions * ====================================================================== *//* * Execute the desired conversion of the 'object' value into the * specified class. */${#conversions.convert(object, 'java.util.TimeZone')}${#conversions.convert(object, targetClass)} Â∏∏Áî®Á±ªÂûãÊó•Êúü #datesÔºöjava.util.DateÂØπË±°ÁöÑÂÆûÁî®ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºö 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647484950515253545556575859606162636465666768697071/* * ====================================================================== *//* * Format date with the standard locale format * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#dates.format(date)}${#dates.arrayFormat(datesArray)}${#dates.listFormat(datesList)}${#dates.setFormat(datesSet)}/* * Format date with the ISO8601 format * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#dates.formatISO(date)}${#dates.arrayFormatISO(datesArray)}${#dates.listFormatISO(datesList)}${#dates.setFormatISO(datesSet)}/* * Format date with the specified pattern * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#dates.format(date, 'dd/MMM/yyyy HH:mm')}${#dates.arrayFormat(datesArray, 'dd/MMM/yyyy HH:mm')}${#dates.listFormat(datesList, 'dd/MMM/yyyy HH:mm')}${#dates.setFormat(datesSet, 'dd/MMM/yyyy HH:mm')}/* * Obtain date properties * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#dates.day(date)} // also arrayDay(...), listDay(...), etc.${#dates.month(date)} // also arrayMonth(...), listMonth(...), etc.${#dates.monthName(date)} // also arrayMonthName(...), listMonthName(...), etc.${#dates.monthNameShort(date)} // also arrayMonthNameShort(...), listMonthNameShort(...), etc.${#dates.year(date)} // also arrayYear(...), listYear(...), etc.${#dates.dayOfWeek(date)} // also arrayDayOfWeek(...), listDayOfWeek(...), etc.${#dates.dayOfWeekName(date)} // also arrayDayOfWeekName(...), listDayOfWeekName(...), etc.${#dates.dayOfWeekNameShort(date)} // also arrayDayOfWeekNameShort(...), listDayOfWeekNameShort(...), etc.${#dates.hour(date)} // also arrayHour(...), listHour(...), etc.${#dates.minute(date)} // also arrayMinute(...), listMinute(...), etc.${#dates.second(date)} // also arraySecond(...), listSecond(...), etc.${#dates.millisecond(date)} // also arrayMillisecond(...), listMillisecond(...), etc./* * Create date (java.util.Date) objects from its components */${#dates.create(year,month,day)}${#dates.create(year,month,day,hour,minute)}${#dates.create(year,month,day,hour,minute,second)}${#dates.create(year,month,day,hour,minute,second,millisecond)}/* * Create a date (java.util.Date) object for the current date and time */${#dates.createNow()}${#dates.createNowForTimeZone()}/* * Create a date (java.util.Date) object for the current date (time set to 00:00) */${#dates.createToday()}${#dates.createTodayForTimeZone()} Êó•ÂéÜ #calendarsÔºöÁ±ª‰ºº‰∫é#datesÔºå‰ΩÜÂØπ‰∫éjava.util.CalendarÂØπË±°Ôºö 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576/* * ====================================================================== *//* * Format calendar with the standard locale format * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#calendars.format(cal)}${#calendars.arrayFormat(calArray)}${#calendars.listFormat(calList)}${#calendars.setFormat(calSet)}/* * Format calendar with the ISO8601 format * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#calendars.formatISO(cal)}${#calendars.arrayFormatISO(calArray)}${#calendars.listFormatISO(calList)}${#calendars.setFormatISO(calSet)}/* * Format calendar with the specified pattern * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#calendars.format(cal, 'dd/MMM/yyyy HH:mm')}${#calendars.arrayFormat(calArray, 'dd/MMM/yyyy HH:mm')}${#calendars.listFormat(calList, 'dd/MMM/yyyy HH:mm')}${#calendars.setFormat(calSet, 'dd/MMM/yyyy HH:mm')}/* * Obtain calendar properties * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#calendars.day(date)} // also arrayDay(...), listDay(...), etc.${#calendars.month(date)} // also arrayMonth(...), listMonth(...), etc.${#calendars.monthName(date)} // also arrayMonthName(...), listMonthName(...), etc.${#calendars.monthNameShort(date)} // also arrayMonthNameShort(...), listMonthNameShort(...), etc.${#calendars.year(date)} // also arrayYear(...), listYear(...), etc.${#calendars.dayOfWeek(date)} // also arrayDayOfWeek(...), listDayOfWeek(...), etc.${#calendars.dayOfWeekName(date)} // also arrayDayOfWeekName(...), listDayOfWeekName(...), etc.${#calendars.dayOfWeekNameShort(date)} // also arrayDayOfWeekNameShort(...), listDayOfWeekNameShort(...), etc.${#calendars.hour(date)} // also arrayHour(...), listHour(...), etc.${#calendars.minute(date)} // also arrayMinute(...), listMinute(...), etc.${#calendars.second(date)} // also arraySecond(...), listSecond(...), etc.${#calendars.millisecond(date)} // also arrayMillisecond(...), listMillisecond(...), etc./* * Create calendar (java.util.Calendar) objects from its components */${#calendars.create(year,month,day)}${#calendars.create(year,month,day,hour,minute)}${#calendars.create(year,month,day,hour,minute,second)}${#calendars.create(year,month,day,hour,minute,second,millisecond)}${#calendars.createForTimeZone(year,month,day,timeZone)}${#calendars.createForTimeZone(year,month,day,hour,minute,timeZone)}${#calendars.createForTimeZone(year,month,day,hour,minute,second,timeZone)}${#calendars.createForTimeZone(year,month,day,hour,minute,second,millisecond,timeZone)}/* * Create a calendar (java.util.Calendar) object for the current date and time */${#calendars.createNow()}${#calendars.createNowForTimeZone()}/* * Create a calendar (java.util.Calendar) object for the current date (time set to 00:00) */${#calendars.createToday()}${#calendars.createTodayForTimeZone()} Êï∞Â≠ó #numbersÔºöÊï∞Â≠óÂØπË±°ÁöÑÂÆûÁî®ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºö 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112/* * ====================================================================== * See javadoc API for class org.thymeleaf.expression.Numbers * ====================================================================== *//* * ========================== * Formatting integer numbers * ========================== *//* * Set minimum integer digits. * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#numbers.formatInteger(num,3)}${#numbers.arrayFormatInteger(numArray,3)}${#numbers.listFormatInteger(numList,3)}${#numbers.setFormatInteger(numSet,3)}/* * Set minimum integer digits and thousands separator: * 'POINT', 'COMMA', 'WHITESPACE', 'NONE' or 'DEFAULT' (by locale). * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#numbers.formatInteger(num,3,'POINT')}${#numbers.arrayFormatInteger(numArray,3,'POINT')}${#numbers.listFormatInteger(numList,3,'POINT')}${#numbers.setFormatInteger(numSet,3,'POINT')}/* * ========================== * Formatting decimal numbers * ========================== *//* * Set minimum integer digits and (exact) decimal digits. * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#numbers.formatDecimal(num,3,2)}${#numbers.arrayFormatDecimal(numArray,3,2)}${#numbers.listFormatDecimal(numList,3,2)}${#numbers.setFormatDecimal(numSet,3,2)}/* * Set minimum integer digits and (exact) decimal digits, and also decimal separator. * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#numbers.formatDecimal(num,3,2,'COMMA')}${#numbers.arrayFormatDecimal(numArray,3,2,'COMMA')}${#numbers.listFormatDecimal(numList,3,2,'COMMA')}${#numbers.setFormatDecimal(numSet,3,2,'COMMA')}/* * Set minimum integer digits and (exact) decimal digits, and also thousands and * decimal separator. * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#numbers.formatDecimal(num,3,'POINT',2,'COMMA')}${#numbers.arrayFormatDecimal(numArray,3,'POINT',2,'COMMA')}${#numbers.listFormatDecimal(numList,3,'POINT',2,'COMMA')}${#numbers.setFormatDecimal(numSet,3,'POINT',2,'COMMA')}/* * ===================== * Formatting currencies * ===================== */${#numbers.formatCurrency(num)}${#numbers.arrayFormatCurrency(numArray)}${#numbers.listFormatCurrency(numList)}${#numbers.setFormatCurrency(numSet)}/* * ====================== * Formatting percentages * ====================== */${#numbers.formatPercent(num)}${#numbers.arrayFormatPercent(numArray)}${#numbers.listFormatPercent(numList)}${#numbers.setFormatPercent(numSet)}/* * Set minimum integer digits and (exact) decimal digits. */${#numbers.formatPercent(num, 3, 2)}${#numbers.arrayFormatPercent(numArray, 3, 2)}${#numbers.listFormatPercent(numList, 3, 2)}${#numbers.setFormatPercent(numSet, 3, 2)}/* * =============== * Utility methods * =============== *//* * Create a sequence (array) of integer numbers going * from x to y */${#numbers.sequence(from,to)}${#numbers.sequence(from,to,step)} Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ #stringsÔºöStringÂØπË±°ÁöÑÂÆûÁî®ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºö 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122123124125126127128129130/* * ====================================================================== * See javadoc API for class org.thymeleaf.expression.Strings * ====================================================================== *//* * Null-safe toString() */${#strings.toString(obj)} // also array*, list* and set*/* * Check whether a String is empty (or null). Performs a trim() operation before check * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#strings.isEmpty(name)}${#strings.arrayIsEmpty(nameArr)}${#strings.listIsEmpty(nameList)}${#strings.setIsEmpty(nameSet)}/* * Perform an 'isEmpty()' check on a string and return it if false, defaulting to * another specified string if true. * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#strings.defaultString(text,default)}${#strings.arrayDefaultString(textArr,default)}${#strings.listDefaultString(textList,default)}${#strings.setDefaultString(textSet,default)}/* * Check whether a fragment is contained in a String * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#strings.contains(name,'ez')} // also array*, list* and set*${#strings.containsIgnoreCase(name,'ez')} // also array*, list* and set*/* * Check whether a String starts or ends with a fragment * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#strings.startsWith(name,'Don')} // also array*, list* and set*${#strings.endsWith(name,endingFragment)} // also array*, list* and set*/* * Substring-related operations * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#strings.indexOf(name,frag)} // also array*, list* and set*${#strings.substring(name,3,5)} // also array*, list* and set*${#strings.substringAfter(name,prefix)} // also array*, list* and set*${#strings.substringBefore(name,suffix)} // also array*, list* and set*${#strings.replace(name,'las','ler')} // also array*, list* and set*/* * Append and prepend * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#strings.prepend(str,prefix)} // also array*, list* and set*${#strings.append(str,suffix)} // also array*, list* and set*/* * Change case * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#strings.toUpperCase(name)} // also array*, list* and set*${#strings.toLowerCase(name)} // also array*, list* and set*/* * Split and join */${#strings.arrayJoin(namesArray,',')}${#strings.listJoin(namesList,',')}${#strings.setJoin(namesSet,',')}${#strings.arraySplit(namesStr,',')} // returns String[]${#strings.listSplit(namesStr,',')} // returns List<String>${#strings.setSplit(namesStr,',')} // returns Set<String>/* * Trim * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#strings.trim(str)} // also array*, list* and set*/* * Compute length * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#strings.length(str)} // also array*, list* and set*/* * Abbreviate text making it have a maximum size of n. If text is bigger, it * will be clipped and finished in "..." * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#strings.abbreviate(str,10)} // also array*, list* and set*/* * Convert the first character to upper-case (and vice-versa) */${#strings.capitalize(str)} // also array*, list* and set*${#strings.unCapitalize(str)} // also array*, list* and set*/* * Convert the first character of every word to upper-case */${#strings.capitalizeWords(str)} // also array*, list* and set*${#strings.capitalizeWords(str,delimiters)} // also array*, list* and set*/* * Escape the string */${#strings.escapeXml(str)} // also array*, list* and set*${#strings.escapeJava(str)} // also array*, list* and set*${#strings.escapeJavaScript(str)} // also array*, list* and set*${#strings.unescapeJava(str)} // also array*, list* and set*${#strings.unescapeJavaScript(str)} // also array*, list* and set*/* * Null-safe comparison and concatenation */${#strings.equals(first, second)}${#strings.equalsIgnoreCase(first, second)}${#strings.concat(values...)}${#strings.concatReplaceNulls(nullValue, values...)}/* * Random */${#strings.randomAlphanumeric(count)} ÂØπË±° #objectsÔºö‰∏ÄËà¨ÂØπË±°ÁöÑÂÆûÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÊñπÊ≥ï 1234567891011121314/* * ====================================================================== * See javadoc API for class org.thymeleaf.expression.Objects * ====================================================================== *//* * Return obj if it is not null, and default otherwise * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#objects.nullSafe(obj,default)}${#objects.arrayNullSafe(objArray,default)}${#objects.listNullSafe(objList,default)}${#objects.setNullSafe(objSet,default)} Â∏ÉÂ∞î #boolsÔºöÂ∏ÉÂ∞îËØÑ‰º∞ÁöÑÂÆûÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÊñπÊ≥ï 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940/* * ====================================================================== * See javadoc API for class org.thymeleaf.expression.Bools * ====================================================================== *//* * Evaluate a condition in the same way that it would be evaluated in a th:if tag * (see conditional evaluation chapter afterwards). * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#bools.isTrue(obj)}${#bools.arrayIsTrue(objArray)}${#bools.listIsTrue(objList)}${#bools.setIsTrue(objSet)}/* * Evaluate with negation * Also works with arrays, lists or sets */${#bools.isFalse(cond)}${#bools.arrayIsFalse(condArray)}${#bools.listIsFalse(condList)}${#bools.setIsFalse(condSet)}/* * Evaluate and apply AND operator * Receive an array, a list or a set as parameter */${#bools.arrayAnd(condArray)}${#bools.listAnd(condList)}${#bools.setAnd(condSet)}/* * Evaluate and apply OR operator * Receive an array, a list or a set as parameter */${#bools.arrayOr(condArray)}${#bools.listOr(condList)}${#bools.setOr(condSet)} ÈõÜÂêàÁ±ªÂûãÊï∞ÁªÑ #arraysÔºöÊï∞ÁªÑÁöÑÂÆûÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÊñπÊ≥ï 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839/* * ====================================================================== * See javadoc API for class org.thymeleaf.expression.Arrays * ====================================================================== *//* * Converts to array, trying to infer array component class. * Note that if resulting array is empty, or if the elements * of the target object are not all of the same class, * this method will return Object[]. */${#arrays.toArray(object)}/* * Convert to arrays of the specified component class. */${#arrays.toStringArray(object)}${#arrays.toIntegerArray(object)}${#arrays.toLongArray(object)}${#arrays.toDoubleArray(object)}${#arrays.toFloatArray(object)}${#arrays.toBooleanArray(object)}/* * Compute length */${#arrays.length(array)}/* * Check whether array is empty */${#arrays.isEmpty(array)}/* * Check if element or elements are contained in array */${#arrays.contains(array, element)}${#arrays.containsAll(array, elements)} List #listsÔºöÂàóË°®ÁöÑÂÆûÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÊñπÊ≥ï 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233/* * ====================================================================== * See javadoc API for class org.thymeleaf.expression.Lists * ====================================================================== *//* * Converts to list */${#lists.toList(object)}/* * Compute size */${#lists.size(list)}/* * Check whether list is empty */${#lists.isEmpty(list)}/* * Check if element or elements are contained in list */${#lists.contains(list, element)}${#lists.containsAll(list, elements)}/* * Sort a copy of the given list. The members of the list must implement * comparable or you must define a comparator. */${#lists.sort(list)}${#lists.sort(list, comparator)} Set #setsÔºöÈõÜÂêàÁöÑÂÆûÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÊñπÊ≥ï 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526/* * ====================================================================== * See javadoc API for class org.thymeleaf.expression.Sets * ====================================================================== *//* * Converts to set */${#sets.toSet(object)}/* * Compute size */${#sets.size(set)}/* * Check whether set is empty */${#sets.isEmpty(set)}/* * Check if element or elements are contained in set */${#sets.contains(set, element)}${#sets.containsAll(set, elements)} Map #mapsÔºöÂú∞ÂõæÁöÑÂÆûÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÊñπÊ≥ï 1234567891011121314151617181920212223/* * ====================================================================== * See javadoc API for class org.thymeleaf.expression.Maps * ====================================================================== *//* * Compute size */${#maps.size(map)}/* * Check whether map is empty */${#maps.isEmpty(map)}/* * Check if key/s or value/s are contained in maps */${#maps.containsKey(map, key)}${#maps.containsAllKeys(map, keys)}${#maps.containsValue(map, value)}${#maps.containsAllValues(map, value)} ÈõÜÂêàÊìç‰Ωú #aggregatesÔºöÁî®‰∫éÂú®Êï∞ÁªÑÊàñÈõÜÂêà‰∏äÂàõÂª∫ËÅöÂêàÁöÑÂÆûÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÊñπÊ≥ï 1234567891011121314151617/* * ====================================================================== * See javadoc API for class org.thymeleaf.expression.Aggregates * ====================================================================== *//* * Compute sum. Returns null if array or collection is empty */${#aggregates.sum(array)}${#aggregates.sum(collection)}/* * Compute average. Returns null if array or collection is empty */${#aggregates.avg(array)}${#aggregates.avg(collection)} Ê†áËØÜ #idsÔºöÁî®‰∫éÂ§ÑÁêÜidÂèØËÉΩÈáçÂ§çÁöÑÂ±ûÊÄßÁöÑÂÆûÁî®Á®ãÂ∫èÊñπÊ≥ïÔºà‰æãÂ¶ÇÔºå‰Ωú‰∏∫Ëø≠‰ª£ÁöÑÁªìÊûúÔºâ„ÄÇ 12345678910111213141516171819202122/* * ====================================================================== * See javadoc API for class org.thymeleaf.expression.Ids * ====================================================================== *//* * Normally used in th:id attributes, for appending a counter to the id attribute value * so that it remains unique even when involved in an iteration process. */${#ids.seq('someId')}/* * Normally used in th:for attributes in <label> tags, so that these labels can refer to Ids * generated by means if the #ids.seq(...) function. * * Depending on whether the <label> goes before or after the element with the #ids.seq(...) * function, the "next" (label goes before "seq") or the "prev" function (label goes after * "seq") function should be called. */${#ids.next('someId')}${#ids.prev('someId')}

entry.title: ÊµÖË∞àThymeleaf
entry.content: Thymeleaf ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Ë∑ü FreeMarker„ÄÅVelocity Á±ª‰ººÁöÑÊ®°ÊùøÂºïÊìéÔºåÊòØ Spring ÊâÄÊé®ËçêÁöÑÊ®°ÊùøÊäÄÊúØ „ÄÇ Thymeleaf Âºï‰ª•‰∏∫ÂÇ≤ÁöÑÁâπÊÄßÊòØ Ëá™ÁÑ∂Ê®°ÊùøÔºànatural templatingÔºâ ÔºåÂç≥Áî±‰∫é‰∏ªË¶ÅËØ≠Ê≥ïÂü∫‰∫éÊ†áÁ≠æÂ±ûÊÄßÁ≠âÔºå‰ΩøÂæóÊ®°ÊùøÂèØ‰ª•Áõ¥Êé•Âú®ÈùôÊÄÅÁéØÂ¢ÉÊòæÁ§∫Ê≠£Â∏∏„ÄÇ Êú¨ÊñáÂÜÖÂÆπÂü∫‰∫é Thymeleaf3.0 „ÄÇ ThymeleafÊñáÊ°£ ‰ΩøÁî®Thymeleaf Thymeleaf+Spring Êú¨ÊñáÂÜÖÂÆπÂè™Âü∫‰∫é htmlÊ®°Êùø ÔºåËôΩÁÑ∂Thymeleaf Êèê‰æõ‰∫ÜÊñáÊú¨Ê®°ÊùøÊ®°ÂºèÔºàTextual template modesÔºâÔºå‰ΩøÂÖ∂ÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩúÁî®‰∫é .js Âíå .css Ôºå‰ΩÜÊòØËøôÈáå‰∏ç‰ºöÊ∂âÂèä„ÄÇ ÊñπË®ÄÂíåÂ±ûÊÄß‰øÆÊîπÂô®ÊñπË®Ä Thymeleaf ÈõÜÊàêÂåÖÂÆö‰πâ‰∫Ü‰∏ÄÁßç Ê†áÂáÜÊñπË®Ä Ôºà SpringStandard Dialect ÔºâÔºåÂÖ∂ÂÖºÂÆπ‰∫Ü Spring EL ÔºåËÄå Spring EL Âü∫Êú¨Âíå OGNL Áõ∏ÂêåÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî®Ëµ∑Êù•ÂçÅÂàÜÂèãÂ•Ω„ÄÇ Â±ûÊÄß‰øÆÊîπÂô® Ê†áÂáÜÊñπË®ÄÁöÑÂ§öÊï∞Â§ÑÁêÜÂô®ÈÉΩÊòØÂ±ûÊÄßÂ§ÑÁêÜÂô®ÔºåThymeleaf ÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî®‰∏§ÁßçÂ±ûÊÄß‰øÆÊîπÂô®ËØ≠Ê≥ï Ôºö Â±ûÊÄß‰øÆÊîπÂô®ËØ≠Ê≥ï ËØ¥Êòé Á§∫‰æã th:* ÂëΩÂêçÁ©∫Èó¥ËØ≠Ê≥ï„ÄÇ <input th:value="${username}"> data-{prefix}-{name} html5Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÂ±ûÊÄßËØ≠Ê≥ï„ÄÇ <input data-th-value="${username}"> ThymeleafË°®ËææÂºè ‰ºöÁõ¥Êé•Â±ïÁ§∫Âú®ÈùôÊÄÅÁéØÂ¢É‰∏≠Ôºå‰∏çÂà©‰∫éÂéüÂûãËÆæËÆ°„ÄÇ 1234<p>Hello, [[${session.user.name}]]!</p><!-- Á≠âÂêå‰∫é --><p>Hello, <span th:text="${session.user.name}">Sebastian</span>!</p> 1234<p>Hello, [(${session.user.name})]!</p><!-- Á≠âÂêå‰∫é --><p>Hello, <span th:utext="${session.user.name}">Sebastian</span>!</p> Á¶ÅÁî®ÂÜÖËÅî ÂèØ‰ª•ÁúãÂá∫ [[]] Ê†áËÆ∞‰ºöË¢´ Thymeleaf Ëß£ÊûêÔºåÂú®Êüê‰∫õÊÉÖÂÜµ‰∏ãÂπ∂‰∏çÂ•ΩÔºåËøôÊó∂ÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî® th:inline="none" Á¶ÅÁî®Ê≠§Êú∫Âà∂„ÄÇ 1<p th:inline="none">A double array looks like this: [[1, 2, 3], [4, 5]]!</p> JavaScript ÂÜÖËÅîJavaScriptÂÜÖËÅî‰∏≠‰πüÊîØÊåÅ [[]] Âíå [()] Ôºå‰ΩÜÈÉΩ‰∏çËÉΩÁ°Æ‰øùÂèñÂÄº‰∏ÄÂÆöÊòØÂêàÈÄÇÁöÑÂêàÊ≥ïÁöÑ jsÂèòÈáè ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Êé®Ëçê‰ΩøÁî® Ëá™ÁÑ∂Ê®°Êùø ÔºåÂç≥ /*[[]]*/ „ÄÇËá™ÁÑ∂Ê®°Êùø‰πüÊîØÊåÅÈªòËÆ§ÂÄºÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÂØπÈùôÊÄÅÁéØÂ¢ÉÊõ¥Âä†ÂèãÂ•Ω„ÄÇ ÂøÖÈ°ª‰ΩøÁî® th:inline="javascript" ‰ª•‰∏ãÊñπÂºèÊòéÁ°ÆÂêØÁî®JavaScript ÂÜÖËÅîÊ®°ÂºèÔºö 123456<script th:inline="javascript"> ... var username1 = /*[[${session.user.name}]]*/ ; var username2 = /*[[${session.user.name}]]*/ "Gertrud Kiwifruit"; ...</script> CSS ÂÜÖËÅîCSSÂÜÖËÅî‰∏≠ÂêåÊ†∑ÊîØÊåÅ [[]] Âíå [()] Ôºå‰ΩÜÊõ¥Êé®ËçêËá™ÁÑ∂Ê®°Êùø /*[[]]*/ „ÄÇ ÂøÖÈ°ª‰ΩøÁî® th:inline="css" ‰ª•‰∏ãÊñπÂºèÊòéÁ°ÆÂêØÁî®cssÂÜÖËÅîÊ®°ÂºèÔºö 12345<style th:inline="css"> .main\ elems { text-align: /*[[${align}]]*/ left; }</style>

entry.title: ÊµÖË∞àOracle‰πãSQL‰∏≠ÁöÑÂáΩÊï∞‰∏éË°®ËææÂºè
entry.content: ÈíàÂØπ OracleÔºåÊú¨Êñá‰ºöË∞à‰∏ÄË∞àÔºåÂú® sql ‰∏≠Â∏∏‰ºö‰ΩøÁî®Âà∞ÁöÑÂáΩÊï∞ÂíåË°®ËææÂºèÔºåÈÄÇÂΩìÁöÑ‰ΩøÁî®ÂÆÉ‰ª¨ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ÊèêÈ´òÂºÄÂèëÊïàÁéáÂíåË¥®Èáè„ÄÇ Êú¨ÊñáÁ§∫‰æãÂùá‰ΩøÁî® oracle Ëá™Â∏¶ÁöÑÁ§∫‰æãË°®„ÄÇ Ê∂âÂèä‰∏ÄËßà ËØ¥Êòé CASE... WHEN... Á±ª‰ºº‰∫é IF/ELSE „ÄÇ WITH... AS Áõ∏ÂΩì‰∫éÂàõÂª∫‰∏¥Êó∂Ë°®ÔºåÈÄÇÁî®‰∫éÈúÄË¶ÅÈáçÂ§çÂ§ÑÁêÜ‰∏ÄÁ±ªÊï∞ÊçÆ NVL() / NVL2() NULL Â§ÑÁêÜÔºåÊ≠§Êó∂Á±ª‰ºº IF/ELSE „ÄÇ DECODE() ÂÄºÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºåÊ≠§Êó∂Á±ª‰ºº IF/ELSE „ÄÇ TRUNC() Êó∂Èó¥Êà™ÂèñÂáΩÊï∞„ÄÇ TO_CHAR() / TO_DATE() Êó•ÊúüÁ±ªÂûãÂíåÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤Á±ªÂûãËΩ¨Êç¢„ÄÇ ROW_NUMBER() OVER ÁªÑÂÜÖÊéíÂ∫èÔºåÂπ∂ÁªôÂá∫ÊéíÂ∫èÁöÑÁºñÂè∑„ÄÇ LISTAGG(...) WITHIN GROUP(...) ÂàóÂÄºÊãºÊé•Ôºå‰∏ÄËà¨ÈÖçÂêàÂàÜÁªÑ‰ΩøÁî®„ÄÇ START WITH...CONNECT BY PRIOR... ÂØπÊ†ëÁªìÊûÑÈÄíÂΩíÊü•ËØ¢„ÄÇ Â∏∏Áî®ÂáΩÊï∞ÂíåË°®ËææÂºèCASE... WHEN...Á±ª‰ºº‰∫é IF/ELSE 12345678910111213141516171819-- ÊñπÂºè‰∏Äselect empno as Â∑•Âè∑, (CASE ename WHEN 'SMITH' THEN 'Âè≤ÂØÜÊñØ' WHEN 'ALLEN' THEN 'Ëâæ‰º¶' ELSE ename END) as ÂßìÂêçfrom emp;-- ÊñπÂºè‰∫åselect empno as Â∑•Âè∑, (CASE WHEN ename='SMITH' THEN 'Âè≤ÂØÜÊñØ' WHEN ename='ALLEN' THEN 'Ëâæ‰º¶' ELSE ename END) as ÂßìÂêçfrom emp; WITH... ASÁõ∏ÂΩì‰∫éÂàõÂª∫‰∏¥Êó∂Ë°®ÔºåÂΩìÈúÄË¶ÅÈáçÂ§çÂ§ÑÁêÜ‰∏ÄÁ±ªÊï∞ÊçÆÊó∂ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Ëµ∑Âà∞‰ºòÂåñ‰ΩúÁî®„ÄÇ 12345678with a as (select * from emp where hiredate > date'1981-01-01' and job = 'MANAGER'), b as (select * from emp where hiredate < date'1981-06-01' and job = 'SALESMAN')select * from a where ename like '%A%' and ename not like '%B%'union allselect * from a where ename like '%B%' and ename not like '%A%'union allselect * from b DECODE()ÂÄºÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ËææÂà∞ IF/ELSE ÁöÑ‰ΩúÁî®„ÄÇ DECODE(value, if1, then1, if2,then2, . . . else ) 1234select empno as Â∑•Âè∑, DECODE(ename, 'SMITH', 'Âè≤ÂØÜÊñØ', 'ALLEN', 'Ëâæ‰º¶', ename) as ÂßìÂêçfrom emp; NVL()NULL Â§ÑÁêÜÔºåÂèØ‰ª•ËææÂà∞ IF/ELSE ÁöÑ‰ΩúÁî®„ÄÇ Á§∫‰æã ËØ¥Êòé NVL(v1, v2) Ëã•v1‰∏∫nullÊó∂ÔºåÂèñv2, Âê¶ÂàôÂèñÊú¨Ë∫´v1 NVL2(v1, v2, v3) Ëã•v1‰∏∫nullÊó∂ÔºåÂèñv3, Âê¶ÂàôÂèñv2 TRUNC()Á±ª‰ººÊà™ÂèñÂáΩÊï∞ÔºåÊåâÁÖßÊåáÂÆöÁöÑÊ†ºÂºèÊà™ÂèñËæìÂÖ•ÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆ„ÄÇ 12-- date Êó∂Èó¥Ê†ºÂºèÔºåfmt Êó•ÊúüÊ†ºÂºè„ÄÇËØ≠Ê≥ïÊ†ºÂºèÔºötrunc(date [, 'fmt']) SYSDATE ÔºöÁ≥ªÁªüÊó∂Èó¥„ÄÇ Á§∫‰æã 2018/3/19 14:31:13 ÁªìÊûú ËØ¥Êòé select trunc(sysdate, 'dd') from dual 2018/03/20 ËøîÂõûÂΩìÂâçÊó∂Èó¥ÔºöÂ§© select trunc(sysdate, 'hh24') from dual 2018/3/20 14:00:00 ËøîÂõûÂΩìÂâçÊó∂Èó¥ÔºöÂ∞èÊó∂ select trunc(sysdate) from dual 2018/03/20 ËøîÂõûÂΩìÂâçÊó∂Èó¥ select trunc(sysdate, 'yy') from dual 2018/01/01 ËøîÂõûÂΩìÂπ¥Á¨¨‰∏ÄÂ§© select trunc(sysdate, 'mm') from dual 2018/03/01 ËøîÂõûÂΩìÊúàÁöÑÁ¨¨‰∏ÄÂ§© select trunc(sysdate, 'd') from dual 2018/03/19 ËøîÂõûÂΩìÂâç‰ø°ÊÅØÁöÑÁ¨¨‰∏ÄÂ§© select trunc(sysdate, 'mi') from dual 2018/3/19 14:31:00 ËøîÂõûÂΩìÂâçÊó∂Èó¥ÔºöÂàÜÈíü TO_CHAR() / TO_DATE()ËøôÈáå‰ªÖËØ¥Êòé Êó•ÊúüÁ±ªÂûã Âíå Â≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤Á±ªÂûã ÁöÑÁõ∏‰∫íËΩ¨Êç¢„ÄÇ Á§∫‰æã 2018/3/19 14:31:13 ÁªìÊûú select to_char( sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') from dual 2018/3/19 select to_date('2018/3/19', 'YYYY-MM-DD') from dual 2018/3/19 12-- sql Ë∞ÉËØïÊó∂ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Áõ¥Êé•‰ΩøÁî®‰ª•‰∏ãÊñπÂºè„ÄÇselect date'2018-03-19' from dual; ROW_NUMBER() OVER12-- Â∞ÜË°®ÊåâÁÖßaÂ≠óÊÆµËøõË°åÂàÜÁªÑÔºå‰πãÂêéÊåâÁÖßbÂ≠óÊÆµËøõË°åÁªÑÂÜÖÊéíÂ∫èÔºåÂπ∂ÁªôÂá∫ÊéíÂ∫èÁöÑÁºñÂè∑„ÄÇROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY a ORDER BY b) Ê†πÊçÆÂ∑•‰ΩúËøõË°åÂàÜÁªÑÔºåÂπ∂ÊåâËñ™ËµÑËøõË°åÈôçÂ∫èÊéíÂêç„ÄÇ 123select empno,ename,job,sal, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY job order by sal desc) as job_rankfrom emp 12345678910111213141516 EMPNO ENAME JOB SAL JOB_RANK---------- ---------- --------- ---------- ---------- 7902 FORD ANALYST 3000 1 7788 SCOTT ANALYST 3000 2 7934 MILLER CLERK 1300 1 7876 ADAMS CLERK 1100 2 7900 JAMES CLERK 950 3 7369 SMITH CLERK 800 4 7566 JONES MANAGER 2975 1 7698 BLAKE MANAGER 2850 2 7782 CLARK MANAGER 2450 3 7839 KING PRESIDENT 5000 1 7499 ALLEN SALESMAN 1600 1 7844 TURNER SALESMAN 1500 2 7654 MARTIN SALESMAN 1250 3 7521 WARD SALESMAN 1250 4 LISTAGG(...) WITHIN GROUP(...)ÂàóÂÄºÊãºÊé•ÔºåÊ†πÊçÆ sal ÊéíÂ∫è„ÄÇ 123select listagg(ename, ',') within group(order by sal) as namefrom emp; 123NAME--------------------------------------------------------------------------------SMITH,JAMES,ADAMS,MARTIN,WARD,MILLER,TURNER,ALLEN,CLARK,BLAKE,JONES,FORD,SCOTT,KING ‰∏ÄËà¨ÈÖçÂêàÂàÜÁªÑ‰ΩøÁî®„ÄÇ Âàó‰∏æÂêÑÈÉ®Èó®ÁöÑÂëòÂ∑•ÔºåÂπ∂ÊåâÂ∑•ËµÑÊéíÂ∫è„ÄÇ 12345select deptno, listagg(ename, ',') within group(order by sal) as namefrom empgroup by deptno; 12345DEPTNO NAME------- ---------------------------------------10 MILLER,CLARK,KING20 SMITH,ADAMS,JONES,FORD,SCOTT30 JAMES,MARTIN,WARD,TURNER,ALLEN,BLAKE START WITH...CONNECT BY PRIOR...ÂØπÊ†ëÁªìÊûÑÁöÑÈÄíÂΩíÊü•ËØ¢„ÄÇ 123456SELECT * FROM T-- ÂºÄÂßãÊù°‰ª∂ÔºàÁà∂ËäÇÁÇπ‰∏∫Á©∫ÔºâSTART WITH p_id is null-- ËøûÊé•Êù°‰ª∂ÔºöÂêëpriorË∑üÈöèÁöÑËäÇÁÇπÁ±ªÂûãÊñπÂêëÈÅçÂéÜÔºàÂêëÂ≠êËäÇÁÇπÊñπÂêëÈÄíÂΩíÈÅçÂéÜÔºâCONNECT BY PRIOR id = p_id-- Á≠âÂêå CONNECT BY p_id = PRIOR id Áõ∏ÂÖ≥Â∏∏ËßÅÈóÆÈ¢òNULLÈóÆÈ¢òÂ≠óÊÆµÂ§ÑÁêÜÂΩìÂ≠óÊÆµ‰∏∫ null Êó∂ÔºåÂ∏åÊúõÁâπÊÆäÂ§ÑÁêÜÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî®ÂáΩÊï∞Ôºö NVL() , DECODE() , CASE...WHEN... „ÄÇ ÊéíÂ∫èÂ§ÑÁêÜÂΩìÂ≠óÊÆµ‰∏∫ null Êó∂ÔºåÈªòËÆ§ÁöÑÊéíÂ∫èÂèØËÉΩ‰∏çÊòØÊàë‰ª¨Â∏åÊúõÁöÑÔºåÊ≠§Êó∂ÂèØ‰ª•ÁâπÊÆäÂ§ÑÁêÜ„ÄÇ oracle ‰∏≠ÈªòËÆ§ÊéíÂ∫èÊó∂ÔºåÂΩìÂ≠óÊÆµÂÄº‰∏∫ null Ôºådesc Êó∂Ôºånull ‰ºöÂú®ÊúÄÂâçÈù¢Ôºåasc ‰ºöÂú®ÊúÄÂêéÈù¢„ÄÇ Â≠óÊÆµÂ§ÑÁêÜÔºåÊéíÈô§Âπ≤Êâ∞ NVL() , DECODE() , CASE...WHEN... „ÄÇ nulls last / nulls first 1select * from emp order by sal desc nulls last; Êó•ÊúüÈóÆÈ¢òÊó∂Èó¥ÈáçÂè† ‰∏çÈáçÂè†ÁöÑÊù°‰ª∂: t.endTime < 'ÂèÇÊï∞ÂºÄÂßãÊó∂Èó¥' : ÂΩìÂâçÂºÄÂßãÊó∂Èó¥ Â§ß‰∫é ÂéÜÂè≤ÁªìÊùüÊó∂Èó¥„ÄÇ t.betginTime > 'ÂèÇÊï∞ÁªìÊùüÊó∂Èó¥' : ÂΩìÂâçÁªìÊùüÊó∂Èó¥ Â∞è‰∫é ÂéÜÂè≤ÂºÄÂßãÊó∂Èó¥„ÄÇ 12-- Ëé∑ÂæóÊó∂Èó¥ÈáçÂè†ÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆ(È™åËØÅÊó∂Èó¥ÊòØÂê¶ÈáçÂè†)select ... from table t where ... and not ( t.betginTime > 'ÂèÇÊï∞ÁªìÊùüÊó∂Èó¥' or t.endTime < 'ÂèÇÊï∞ÂºÄÂßãÊó∂Èó¥' ) sequenceOracle ‰∏≠Ê≤°ÊúâËá™Â¢û‰∏ªÈîÆÔºåÊ≠§Êó∂ÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî® sequence ‰ª£Êõø„ÄÇ 123DROP SEQUENCE TAX_SEQUENCE;CREATE SEQUENCE TAX_SEQUENCE INCREMENT BY 1 START WITH 100000 MAXVALUE 100000000 MINVALUE 1 NOCYCLECACHE 20 NOORDER; ‰ΩøÁî®ÊñπÂºè 1234-- Áõ¥Êé•‰ΩøÁî®ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•Áõ¥Êé•Âú® SQL ‰∏≠‰ΩøÁî®„ÄÇTAX_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL-- Èó¥Êé•‰ΩøÁî®Ôºå‰æãÂ¶ÇÊèê‰æõÁªô Java Á®ãÂ∫è„ÄÇselect TAX_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL from dual Âà§Êñ≠Â≠óÊÆµÂÄºÊòØÂê¶‰∏∫Êï∞Â≠óÂ∞ÜÊï∞Â≠óÂ≠óÁ¨¶ËΩ¨Âèò‰∏∫Á©∫Ê†ºÔºåÂÜçÂéªÁ©∫Ê†ºÔºå‰∏∫Á©∫ÁöÑÂàôË°®Á§∫ÂéüÂ≠óÊÆµÂÄº‰∏∫Á∫ØÊï∞Â≠óÂ≠óÁ¨¶ÁªÑÊàê„ÄÇ 12-- Â≠óÊÆµÂÄº‰∏∫Êï∞Â≠óselect * from table where trim(translate(column,'0123456789',' ')) is NULL;

entry.title: ÊµÖË∞àSpringMVC‰πãÊ≥®Ëß£
entry.content: Êú¨Êñá‰ªãÁªç‰∏Ä‰∏ãÂú® Spring MVC ‰∏≠Â∏∏‰ºö‰ΩøÁî®ÁöÑÊ≥®Ëß£„ÄÇ @Controller & @RequestMapping@Controller@Controller ‰ΩúÁî®‰∫éÁ±ªÔºå Controller Ë¥üË¥£Â§ÑÁêÜ‰ªé DispatcherServlet ÂàÜÂèëÁöÑËØ∑Ê±Ç„ÄÇ ÈúÄË¶ÅÊ≥®ÊÑèÁöÑÊòØ @Controller ÂÆûÈôÖÊòØ ËØ¥ÊòéÊÄßÊ≥®Ëß£ ÔºåÂá†‰πéÁ≠âÂêå‰∫é @Component Ôºå‰ºöË¢´ Spring ËØÜÂà´‰∏∫ bean ÔºåÈúÄË¶ÅÈÖçÂêà @RequestMapping ÊâçËÉΩÊàê‰∏∫ÁúüÊ≠£Â§ÑÁêÜËØ∑Ê±ÇÁöÑÂ§ÑÁêÜÂô®„ÄÇ @RequestMapping@RequestMapping Ê≥®Ëß£‰ºöÂ∞Ü HTTP ËØ∑Ê±ÇÊò†Â∞ÑÂà∞ MVC Âíå REST ÊéßÂà∂Âô®ÁöÑÂ§ÑÁêÜÊñπÊ≥ï‰∏äÔºå‰ΩúÁî®‰∫é Controller Á±ªÊàñÊñπÊ≥ï„ÄÇ Â±ûÊÄß ËØ¥Êòé value ÊåáÂÆöËØ∑Ê±ÇÁöÑÂÆûÈôÖÂú∞ÂùÄÔºåÊåáÂÆöÁöÑÂú∞ÂùÄÂèØ‰ª•ÊòØ URI Template Ê®°Âºè„ÄÇ method ÊåáÂÆöËØ∑Ê±ÇÁöÑmethodÁ±ªÂûãÔºå GET / POST / PUT / DELETE Á≠â„ÄÇ consumes ÊåáÂÆöÂ§ÑÁêÜËØ∑Ê±ÇÁöÑÊèê‰∫§ÂÜÖÂÆπÁ±ªÂûãÔºàContent-TypeÔºâÔºå‰æãÂ¶ÇÔºö application/json , text/html „ÄÇ produces ÊåáÂÆöËøîÂõûÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπÁ±ªÂûãÔºå‰ªÖÂΩì request ËØ∑Ê±ÇÂ§¥‰∏≠ÁöÑ( Accept )Á±ªÂûã‰∏≠ÂåÖÂê´ËØ•ÊåáÂÆöÁ±ªÂûãÊâçËøîÂõû„ÄÇ params ÊåáÂÆö request ‰∏≠ÂøÖÈ°ªÂåÖÂê´Êüê‰∫õÂèÇÊï∞ÂÄºÊòØÔºåÊâçËÆ©ËØ•ÊñπÊ≥ïÂ§ÑÁêÜ„ÄÇ headers ÊåáÂÆö request ‰∏≠ÂøÖÈ°ªÂåÖÂê´Êüê‰∫õÊåáÂÆöÁöÑ header ÂÄºÔºåÊâçËÉΩËÆ©ËØ•ÊñπÊ≥ïÂ§ÑÁêÜËØ∑Ê±Ç„ÄÇ @RequestParam & @PathVariable‰∏§‰∏™ÈÉΩÊòØ‰ΩúÁî®‰∫é Controller ÊñπÊ≥ïÂèÇÊï∞ÔºåÁî®‰∫éÂèÇÊï∞ÁªëÂÆö„ÄÇ Ê≥®Ëß£ ËØ¥Êòé @RequestParam ‰∏ªË¶ÅÁî®‰∫éÊé•ÂèóÊôÆÈÄöÁöÑËØ∑Ê±ÇÂèÇÊï∞ÔºåÈùûÂøÖÈúÄ„ÄÇ @PathVariable ÂèñÂá∫ URI Ê®°Êùø‰∏≠ÁöÑÂèòÈáè‰Ωú‰∏∫ÂèÇÊï∞Ôºå‰∏ªË¶ÅÁî®‰∫éÂ§ÑÁêÜ RESTful È£éÊ†ºÁöÑËØ∑Ê±Ç„ÄÇ @RequestParam 1http://localhost:8080/Demo/list?userId=123 12345@RequestMapping(value = "/list", method = RequestMethod.GET)public String toUpload(@RequestParam String userId, Model model){ model.addAttribute("userId", userId); return "upload";} @PathVariable 1http://localhost:8080/Demo/list/123 12345@RequestMapping(value = "/list/{userId}", method = RequestMethod.GET)public String toUpload(@PathVariable String userId, Model model){ model.addAttribute("userId", userId); return "upload";} @RequestBody & @ResponseBody Ê≥®Ëß£ ËØ¥Êòé @RequestBody Áî®‰∫é Controller ÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ïÂèÇÊï∞ Ôºå‰ªé Request ÂØπË±°ÁöÑ Body Êï∞ÊçÆÂå∫‰∏≠ÂèñÂá∫Êï∞ÊçÆ„ÄÇ‰∏ÄËà¨Áî®‰∫éËß£ÊûêÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤Á±ªÂûãÁöÑ Json ‰ø°ÊÅØ„ÄÇ @ResponseBody Áî®‰∫é Controller ÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ï ÔºåÂ∞ÜËøîÂõûÁöÑÂØπË±°ÊîæÂÖ•Âà∞ Response ÂØπË±°ÁöÑ Body Êï∞ÊçÆÂå∫‰∏≠„ÄÇ‰ΩøÁî®ÂêéÂ∞Ü‰∏ç‰ºöËøîÂõûÈ°µÈù¢ËÄåÊòØÊï∞ÊçÆÔºå‰∏ÄËà¨Áî®‰∫éÈùû String ÁöÑÂØπË±°‰Ωú‰∏∫ json Êï∞ÊçÆËøîÂõû„ÄÇ @ModelAttribute & @SessionAttributesËøô‰∏§‰∏™Ê≥®Ëß£ÂèØ‰ª•ÂÆûÁé∞Âú®‰∏çÂêåÁöÑÊ®°ÂûãÔºàmodelÔºâÂíåÊéßÂà∂Âô®‰πãÈó¥ÂÖ±‰∫´Êï∞ÊçÆ„ÄÇ Ê≥®Ëß£ ËØ¥Êòé @ModelAttribute ÔºàËã•‰ΩúÁî®‰∫éÊôÆÈÄöÊñπÊ≥ïÔºâ Ëã•Áî®‰∫éÊôÆÈÄöÊñπÊ≥ïÔºåËØ• Controller ÁöÑÊâÄÊúâÊñπÊ≥ïÂú®Ë∞ÉÁî®ÂâçÔºåÂÖàÊâßË°åÊ≠§ÊñπÊ≥ï„ÄÇ @ModelAttribute ÔºàËã•‰ΩúÁî®‰∫é Controller ÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ïÂèÇÊï∞Ôºâ Ëã•‰ΩúÁî®‰∫é Controller ÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ïÂèÇÊï∞ÔºåËøõË°åÂèÇÊï∞ÁªëÂÆöÔºåÁ±ª‰ºº @RequestParam „ÄÇ @SessionAttributes Áî®‰∫éÁ±ª‰∏äÔºåÂ∞ÜÂÄºÊîæÂà∞session‰ΩúÁî®Âüü‰∏≠„ÄÇ

entry.title: ÊµÖË∞àSpringMVC‰πãÊï∞ÊçÆÁªëÂÆö
entry.content: Spring MVC Êã•ÊúâÂº∫Â§ßÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÁªëÂÆöÊï∞ÊçÆÂäüËÉΩ ÔºåÊú¨Êñá‰ªãÁªç‰∏Ä‰∏ãÂÖ∂ÂØπÂêÑÁßçÊï∞ÊçÆÁ±ªÂûãÁöÑÁªëÂÆö„ÄÇ Êï∞ÊçÆÁªëÂÆö : Â∞ÜËØ∑Ê±Ç‰∏≠ÁöÑÂ≠óÊÆµÊåâÁÖß ÂêçÂ≠óÂåπÈÖç ÁöÑÂéüÂàôÂ°´ÂÖ•Ê®°ÂûãÂØπË±°‰∏≠„ÄÇ Áõ∏ÂÖ≥ËØ∑Ê±ÇÊµãËØïÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî®ChromeÊèí‰ª∂Êèê‰∫§ÔºåÊé®ËçêÔºöRestlet Client „ÄÇ Âü∫Êú¨Á±ªÂûã & ÂåÖË£ÖÁ±ªÂûã & Êï∞ÁªÑ ÂØπ‰∫éËøôÁßçÁ±ªÂûãÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÔºåÁõ¥Êé•‰ΩøÁî® ÂêçÂ≠óÂåπÈÖç Âç≥ÂèØÔºå‰∏çÈúÄË¶ÅÁâπÊÆäÂ§ÑÁêÜ„ÄÇ Âü∫Êú¨Á±ªÂûã & ÂåÖË£ÖÁ±ªÂûã Êé®ËçêÁõ¥Êé•‰ΩøÁî® ÂåÖË£ÖÁ±ªÂûã ‰ª£Êõø Âü∫Êú¨Á±ªÂûã „ÄÇ Êï∞ÊçÆÁ±ªÂûã ‰º†ÈÄíË¶ÅÊ±Ç Á±ªÂûãË¶ÅÊ±Ç Âü∫Êú¨Á±ªÂûã ÔºàÂ¶Ç int Ôºâ ÈªòËÆ§ÂèÇÊï∞ÂøÖÈ°ª‰º†ÔºåÂèç‰πã HTTP Status 500 „ÄÇ Á±ªÂûãÂøÖÈ°ª‰∏ÄËá¥ÔºàÂ¶Ç int ÔºâÔºåÂèç‰πã HTTP Status 400 „ÄÇ ÂåÖË£ÖÁ±ªÂûã ÔºàÂ¶Ç Integer Ôºâ ÂèÇÊï∞ÂèØ‰ª•‰∏ç‰º†ÔºåËã•Â¶ÇÊ≠§‰∏∫ null „ÄÇ Á±ªÂûãÂøÖÈ°ª‰∏ÄËá¥ÔºàÂ¶Ç int ÔºâÔºåÂèç‰πã HTTP Status 400 „ÄÇ Êï∞ÁªÑ Êé®ËçêÂè™‰ΩúÁî®‰∫é Âü∫Êú¨Á±ªÂûã , ÂåÖË£ÖÁ±ªÂûã , String „ÄÇ ÂØπ‰∫é Âü∫Êú¨Á±ªÂûã , ÂåÖË£ÖÁ±ªÂûã , String Êï∞ÁªÑÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÁªëÂÆöÔºåÂíåÂçï‰∏™Êï∞ÊçÆÈááÂèñÁöÑ ÁªëÂÆöÊñπÂºè Âíå Ê≥®ÊÑèÁÇπ Áõ∏Âêå„ÄÇ ÂØπË±°ÁÆÄÂçïÂØπË±° / Â§öÂ±ÇÁ∫ßÂØπË±°‰∏∫‰∫Ü‰æø‰∫éËÆ≤Ëß£ÔºåÊú¨ÊñáÊ®°Êãü‰ΩøÁî® get ËØ∑Ê±ÇÁ±ªÂûãÔºå‰∏î‰∏çËøõË°åËΩ¨‰πâÔºàchrome ‰ºöËá™Âä®ËΩ¨‰πâÔºâ„ÄÇ 1234# ÁÆÄÂçïÂØπË±°http://localhost:8080/binding/ObjectType1?username=Tom&age=12# Â§öÂ±ÇÁ∫ßÂØπË±°http://localhost:8080/binding/ObjectType1?username=Tom&age=12&contactInfo.phone=911 ‰ª•‰∏ãÊòØ Controller ÁöÑÂØπÂ∫îÊñπÊ≥ïÔºå ÂÖ∂‰∏≠ UserÁ±ªÂåÖÂê´‰∫ÜÂêåÂêçÂ±ûÊÄß„ÄÇ 123456/** ÁªëÂÆöÁÆÄÂçïÂØπË±° / ÁªëÂÆöÂ§öÂ±ÇÁ∫ßÂØπË±° */@RequestMapping(value = "/binding/objectType1")@ResponseBodypublic User objectType1(User user){ return user;} ÂêåÂ±ûÊÄßÂ§öÂØπË±°Âõ†‰∏∫ SpringMVC ÊòØÈÄöËøáÁ±ªÁöÑ setter ËøõË°åÁªëÂÆöÁöÑÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÂΩìÁªëÂÆöÂ§ö‰∏™ÂØπË±°‰∏îÂÖ∑ÊúâÁõ∏ÂêåÂ±ûÊÄßÊó∂ÔºåÈªòËÆ§ÂêåÂ±ûÊÄßÈÉΩ‰ºöË¢´ËµãÂÄºÔºåËøôÊó∂ÈúÄË¶ÅÁâπÊÆäÂ§ÑÁêÜ„ÄÇ 1http://localhost:8080/binding/ObjectType2?user.username=Tom&age=12&admin.username=Jack 12345678910111213141516/** ÁªëÂÆöÂêåÂ±ûÊÄßÂ§öÂØπË±°ÔºàUserÂíåAdminÂ±ûÊÄßÂÆåÂÖ®Áõ∏ÂêåÔºâ */@RequestMapping(value = "/binding/objectType2")@ResponseBodypublic String objectType2(User user, Admin admin){ return user.toString() + admin.toString();}/** Âú®ËøõÂÖ•Ê≠§ControllerÂâçÔºå‰ºöÂÖàÂàùÂßãÂåñÊ≠§ÊñπÊ≥ïÔºåÂÆåÊàêÁªëÂÆöÔºåÂÜçÊâßË°åurlÂØπÂ∫îÊñπÊ≥ï */@InitBinder("user")public void initUser(WebDataBinder binder) { /** Â∞ÜÊúâuser.ÂâçÁºÄÁöÑÂ±ûÊÄßÁªëÂÆöÂà∞userÂØπË±°‰∏äÔºàËã•Ê≤°ÊúâÂâçÁΩÆÔºåÂêåÂ±ûÊÄßÈÉΩ‰ºöËµãÂÄºÔºâ */ binder.setFieldDefaultPrefix("user.");}@InitBinder("admin")public void initAdmin(WebDataBinder binder) { binder.setFieldDefaultPrefix("admin.");} List & Set & Map Spring ÂØπ‰∫éÊ≠§Á±ªÂØπË±°ÁªëÂÆöÈúÄË¶Å‰ΩøÁî® Êï∞ÊçÆÊî∂ÈõÜÂØπË±° „ÄÇ ListÈÄöËøá Êï∞ÊçÆÊî∂ÈõÜÂØπË±° ÂÜÖÁöÑ setter ËøõË°åÁªëÂÆöÔºåËßíÊ†áÁ¥¢ÂºïÂèØÁ°ÆÂÆö size „ÄÇ 1http://localhost:8080/binging/listType?users[0].username=Tom&users[1].username=Jack *From.java 12345678910111213141516171819public class UserListForm { private List<User> users; public List<User> getUsers() { return users; } public void setUsers(List<User> users) { this.users = users; } @Override public String toString() { return "UserListForm{" + "users=" + users + '}'; }} *Controller.java 123456/** ÁªëÂÆölist */@RequestMapping(value = "/binging/listType")@ResponseBodypublic String listType(UserListForm userListForm){ return userListForm.toString();} Set ‰∏çÊé®Ëçê‰ΩøÁî®ÔºåÂΩìÈúÄË¶ÅÂéªÈáçÊó∂ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî® List Êé•Êî∂ÂÜç‰ΩøÁî® Set ÂéªÈáç„ÄÇ SpringMVC ÂØπ Set ÁöÑÊîØÊåÅ‰∏çÂ§™Â•ΩÔºå‰∏ç‰ªÖÈúÄË¶Å Êï∞ÊçÆÊî∂ÈõÜÂØπË±° ÂíåÊâãÂä®ÂàùÂßãÂåñ Set ÔºåËøòÈúÄË¶ÅÂâçÂêéÂè∞ size ‰∏ÄËá¥ÔºàËá™Â∑±ÁöÑdemoÊòæÁ§∫ÔºåÈáçÂÜô equals Âíå hashCode ÂêéÊó†Ê≥ïÊ∑ªÂä†Â§ö‰∏™ÂÖÉÁ¥†ÔºåÂç≥‰ΩøÂà§ÂÆö‰∏çÂêåÔºâ„ÄÇ Map1http://localhost:8080/binding/mapType?users['X'].username=Tom&users['Y'].username=Jack *Form.java 12345678910111213141516171819public class UserMapForm { private Map<String, User> users; public Map<String, User> getUsers() { return users; } public void setUsers(Map<String, User> users) { this.users = users; } @Override public String toString() { return "UserMapForm{" + "users=" + users + '}'; }} *Controller.java 123456/** ÁªëÂÆömap */@RequestMapping(value = "mapType")@ResponseBodypublic String mapType(UserMapForm userMapForm){ return userMapForm.toString();} jsonÁªëÂÆö json Êï∞ÊçÆÈúÄË¶Å jackson-databind ‰æùËµñ„ÄÇ 12345<dependency> <groupId>com.fasterxml.jackson.core</groupId> <artifactId>jackson-databind</artifactId> <version>2.5.4</version></dependency> *.json 1234567{ "username": "Tom", "age": 12, "contactInfo":{ "phone": "1234567890" }} *Controller.java ÈúÄË¶Å‰ΩøÁî® @RequestBodyÊ≥®Ëß£ „ÄÇ 123456/** ÁªëÂÆöjson */@RequestMapping(value = "jsonType")@ResponseBodypublic String jsonType(@RequestBody User user){ return user.toString();} xmlÁªëÂÆö xml Êï∞ÊçÆÈúÄË¶Å spring-oxm ‰æùËµñ„ÄÇ 123456<!--xmlÊï∞ÊçÆÁªëÂÆö--><dependency> <groupId>org.springframework</groupId> <artifactId>spring-oxm</artifactId> <version>4.1.9.RELEASE</version></dependency> *.xml 12345<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?><people> <name>Jim</name> <age>16</age></people> *entity.java ÈúÄË¶Å‰ΩøÁî® @XmlRootElement Ê≥®Ëß£„ÄÇ 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233/** ‰∏∫xmlÁªëÂÆöÊèê‰æõÁöÑÂÆû‰ΩìÁ±ª(Ê≥®Ëß£ÈúÄË¶ÅJDK1.7‰ª•‰∏äÊîØÊåÅ) */@XmlRootElement(name = "people")public class People { private String name; private Integer age; @XmlElement(name = "name") public String getName() { return name; } public void setName(String name) { this.name = name; } @XmlElement(name = "age") public Integer getAge() { return age; } public void setAge(Integer age) { this.age = age; } @Override public String toString() { return "People{" + "name='" + name + '\'' + ", age=" + age + '}'; }} *Controller.java ÈúÄË¶Å‰ΩøÁî® @RequestBody Ê≥®Ëß£„ÄÇ 123456789/** * ÁªëÂÆöxmlÔºàÊé®Ëçê‰ΩøÁî®Restlet ClientË∞ÉËØï Ôºâ * Ê≥®ÊÑèPeopleÈúÄË¶Å‰ΩøÁî®Ê≥®Ëß£ */@RequestMapping(value = "xmlType")@ResponseBodypublic String xmlType(@RequestBody People people){ return people.toString();} Date ‰∏ÄËà¨ÂºÄÂèëÊó∂ÔºåÂñúÊ¨¢‰ΩøÁî® String Á±ªÂûãÊé•ÂèóÔºåÁÑ∂ÂêéÂà∞ sql Â±ÇÈù¢ËøõË°åÁ±ªÂûãËΩ¨Êç¢„ÄÇ 123456/** ‰∏ÄËà¨ÁªëÂÆöÊó∂Èó¥Á±ªÂûãÊñπÂºè */@RequestMapping(value = "date")@ResponseBodypublic String date(@DateTimeFormat(iso = DateTimeFormat.ISO.DATE, pattern = "yyyy-MM-dd") Date date){ return date.toString();} Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÁ±ªÂûãËΩ¨ÂåñÂô®‰ΩøÁî®Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÁöÑÁ±ªÂûãËΩ¨ÂåñÂô®ÂèØ‰ª•Êª°Ë∂≥ Â§çÊùÇÂ§öÊ†∑ÁöÑÊï∞ÊçÆÁªëÂÆö ÔºåËøôÈáå Ê®°Êãü ÂØπ 2017-01-17 Ê†ºÂºèÁöÑÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ÁªëÂÆöÂà∞ Date ÂØπË±°‰∏ä„ÄÇÁ±ª‰ººÁöÑËøòÂèØ‰ª•ÁªëÂÆöÔºöÂêÑÁßçÊó∂Èó¥Ê†ºÂºè/Ë¥ßÂ∏ÅÊ†ºÂºè/Êï∞ÊçÆÊ†ºÂºèÁ≠â„ÄÇ Spring Êèê‰æõ‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∫õÁ±ªÂûãËΩ¨ÂåñÊé•Âè£ÔºåÂ¶Ç‰∏ãÔºö Á±ªÂûãËΩ¨ÂåñÊé•Âè£ Áî®ÈÄî ËØ¥Êòé PropertyEditor ‰ΩúÁî® Â±ÄÈÉ® ÔºõÁªëÂÆöÂÄüÂä© WebDataBinder „ÄÇ Spring3 ÂâçÔºåÂÜÖÁΩÆÁöÑÂèØÊâ©Â±ïÊÄß„ÄÇ Formatter ‰ΩúÁî®Â±ÄÈÉ®/ÂÖ®Â±ÄÔºõËá™Âä®ÁªëÂÆöÔºõ ÂèÇÊï∞‰∏∫String „ÄÇ Spring3 ÂêéÔºåÂÜÖÁΩÆÁöÑÂèØÊâ©Â±ïÊÄß„ÄÇ Converter ‰ΩúÁî®Â±ÄÈÉ®/ÂÖ®Â±ÄÔºõËá™Âä®ÁªëÂÆöÔºõÂèÇÊï∞‰∏∫Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâ„ÄÇ Spring3 ÂêéÔºåÂÜÖÁΩÆÁöÑ‰∏çÂèØÊâ©Â±ïÊÄß„ÄÇ ‚Ö† PropertyEditorËøôÁßçÊñπÂºè Âè™ËÉΩ‰ΩúÁî®‰∫éÂ±ÄÈÉ® ÔºåÈúÄË¶ÅÈÖçÂêà @InitBinder ‰ΩøÁî®„ÄÇ 1http://localhost:8888/binding/date1?date1=2017-01-17 *Controller.java 123456789101112/** ÂÄüÂä©PropertyEditorËΩ¨Êç¢Êï∞ÊçÆÔºåÂÆåÊàêÁªëÂÆö */@RequestMapping(value = "date1")@ResponseBodypublic String date1(Date date1){ return date1.toString();}@InitBinder("date1")public void initDate1(WebDataBinder binder){ /** Â∞ÜÂØπÂ∫îÊ†ºÂºèÁöÑÂ≠óÁ¨¶‰∏≤ËΩ¨Âåñ‰∏∫DateÁ±ªÂûã(true:ÂèØ‰ª•‰∏∫Á©∫) */ binder.registerCustomEditor(Date.class, new CustomDateEditor(new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd"), true));} ‚Ö° FormatterËøôÁßçÊñπÂºè Âè™ËÉΩÊé•Âèó String ÂèÇÊï∞ ÔºåÈúÄË¶ÅÂÆûÁé∞ FormatterÊé•Âè£ „ÄÇ 1http://localhost:8888/binding/date2?date2=2017-01-17 *Formatter.java Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâÊ†ºÂºèÂåñËΩ¨Êç¢Âô®ÔºåÂÆûÁé∞ FormatterÊé•Âè£ „ÄÇ 123456789101112/** ÂÆûÁé∞FormatterÔºåËá™ÂÆö‰πâÊ†ºÂºèÂåñËΩ¨Êç¢Âô®Demo */public class MyDateFormatter implements Formatter<Date> { public Date parse(String text, Locale locale) throws ParseException { SimpleDateFormat sdf = new SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd"); return sdf.parse(text); } public String print(Date object, Locale locale) { return null; }} spring-web.xml Ê≥®ÂÜåËá™ÂÆö‰πâÊ†ºÂºèÂåñËΩ¨ÂåñÂô®„ÄÇ 12345678910<mvc:annotation-driven conversion-service="myDateFormatter"/><!--Ê≥®ÂÜåËá™ÂÆö‰πâÊ†ºÂºèÂåñËΩ¨ÂåñÂô®--><bean id="myDateFormatter" class="org.springframework.format.support.FormattingConversionServiceFactoryBean"> <property name="formatters"> <set> <bean class="org.demo.web.formatter.MyDateFormatter" /> </set> </property></bean> Áî®‰∫éÂàÜÈöî URL ÂíåÂèÇÊï∞„ÄÇ % ÊåáÂÆöÁâπÊÆäÂ≠óÁ¨¶„ÄÇ # Ë°®Á§∫È°µÈù¢‰∏≠ÁöÑ‰π¶Á≠æ„ÄÇ & ÂèÇÊï∞Èó¥ÁöÑÂàÜÈöîÁ¨¶„ÄÇ = ÊåáÂÆöÂèÇÊï∞ÁöÑÂÄº„ÄÇ ‰∫åÊ¨°ÁºñËß£Á†ÅÈóÆÈ¢ò ‰∏ÄËà¨Â≠óÁ¨¶‰π±Á†ÅÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåÊòØÂõ†‰∏∫ c/s Êàñ b/s Â≠óÁ¨¶ÈõÜ‰∏çÂêåÈÄ†ÊàêÁöÑÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÂÖàÂÆ¢Êà∑Á´ØÁºñÁ†ÅÔºåÂêéÊúçÂä°Á´ØËß£Á†ÅÂç≥ÂèØÈÅøÂÖç„ÄÇ‰ΩÜÊòØÊàë‰ª¨‰ºöÁªèÂ∏∏ÈÅáÂà∞ÔºåÊúâÊó∂ ‰∏çÁºñËß£Á†Å / ÁºñËß£Á†Å / ‰∏§Ê¨°ÁºñËß£Á†Å ÈÉΩ‰∏ç‰ºöÂá∫Áé∞Â≠óÁ¨¶‰π±Á†ÅÈóÆÈ¢ò„ÄÇ ‰∏∫‰∫Ü‰æø‰∫éÁêÜËß£ÔºåÈúÄË¶ÅÁü•ÈÅì‰ª•‰∏ã‰ø°ÊÅØÔºö URLÂè™ËÉΩÂ≠òÂú® ASCIIÂ≠óÁ¨¶ „ÄÇ TomcatÁöÑ request.getParameter(paramName) ÈªòËÆ§ÊòØ iso-8859-1 Ëß£Á†Å„ÄÇ encodeURI() ‰∏é encodeURIComponent() ‰ΩøÁî®ÁöÑÊòØ UTF-8 ÁºñÁ†Å„ÄÇ UTF-8 / ISO-8859-1 / GBK ÂåÖÂê´ ASCII ‰∏îÈÉΩÊòØÁõ∏ÂêåÁöÑÁ†ÅÂÄº„ÄÇ ‰ª•‰∏ã‰∏∫Â≠óÁ¨¶ ‰∏≠ ÁöÑ‰∫åÊ¨°ÁºñËß£Á†ÅËøáÁ®ãÔºö Âõ†‰∏∫Á¨¨‰∏ÄÊ¨°ÁºñÁ†ÅÂêéÂè™Â≠òÂú® ASCIIÂ≠óÁ¨¶ ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•Á¨¨‰∫åÊ¨° UTF-8ÁºñÁ†Å Á≠âÂêå‰∫é iso-8859-1ÁºñÁ†Å „ÄÇ 12// js : ‰∫åÊ¨°ÁºñÁ†ÅencodeURI(encodeURI(paramName)); 1234// servlet : ‰∫åÊ¨°Ëß£Á†ÅURLDecoder.decode(request.getParameter(paramName), "UTF-8")// struts2 : ‰∫åÊ¨°Ëß£Á†ÅURLDecoder.decode(URLDecoder.decode(paramName, "UTF-8"), "UTF-8"); HTTP ÁºñÁ†ÅÈóÆÈ¢òÁêÜËß£‰∫Ü‰∫åÊ¨°ÁºñÁ†ÅÈóÆÈ¢òÊàë‰ª¨Â∞±ÂèØ‰ª•ÂàÜÊûêÂíåËß£ÂÜ≥ getÊñπÊ≥ï ‰π±Á†ÅÈóÆÈ¢òÔºå‰ΩÜÂØπ‰∫é SpringMVC ËøòÊúâÊõ¥Êñπ‰æøÁöÑÊñπÊ≥ï„ÄÇ ‰ª•‰∏ãÂè™ÈíàÂØπ SpringMVC ‰π±Á†ÅÈóÆÈ¢ò „ÄÇ GET‰øÆÊîπ tomcat ÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂ conf/server.xml ÔºåÊ∑ªÂä†ÁºñÁ†ÅÂíåÂ∑•Á®ãÁºñÁ†Å‰∏ÄËá¥ÔºåÊé®Ëçê‰ΩøÁî® UTF-8 „ÄÇ Âõ†‰∏∫ URL Âè™ËÉΩÂ≠òÂú® ASCII Â≠óÁ¨¶ÈõÜ ÔºåÊâÄ‰ª•ÊµèËßàÂô®ÈªòËÆ§‰ºöÂØπÊ±âÂ≠óËøõË°åÁºñÁ†Å„ÄÇ 123<Connector port="8080" protocol="HTTP/1.1" connectionTimeout="20000" redirectPort="8443" URIEncoding="UTF-8"/> POSTÂú® web.xml ‰∏≠ÈÖçÁΩÆ CharacterEncodingFilter Âç≥ÂèØ„ÄÇ 1234567891011121314151617<!--Â≠óÁ¨¶ËøáÊª§Âô®ÔºàÂè™ÈíàÂØπpostÔºâ--><filter> <filter-name>characterEncodingFilter</filter-name> <filter-class>org.springframework.web.filter.CharacterEncodingFilter</filter-class> <init-param> <param-name>encoding</param-name> <param-value>UTF-8</param-value> </init-param> <init-param> <param-name>forceEncoding</param-name> <param-value>true</param-value> </init-param></filter><filter-mapping> <filter-name>characterEncodingFilter</filter-name> <url-pattern>/*</url-pattern></filter-mapping> IDE Áõ∏ÂÖ≥IDEA ‰∏≠ÁöÑ Reload ‰∏é Convert‰∏ÄËà¨IDE‰ºö‰ΩøÁî®ÂÖ∂ÈªòËÆ§ËÆæÁΩÆËß£ËØªÊñá‰ª∂ÔºåÂ¶ÇÊûúIDEÁöÑÂ≠óÁ¨¶ÈõÜÂíåÊñá‰ª∂Êú¨Ë∫´ÁöÑÂ≠óÁ¨¶ÈõÜ‰∏çÂêåÂ∞±‰ºöÂá∫Áé∞‰π±Á†Å„ÄÇ Ê≠§Êó∂ÂèØ‰ª•ÊîπÂèòÁºñÁ†ÅÊñπÂºèÔºåÂ¶ÇIDEA‰∏≠‰ºöÂá∫Áé∞‰∏§ÁßçÊñπÂºè„ÄÇ Reload : ÈáçËΩΩÔºå‰ΩøÁî®ÊåáÂÆöÁöÑÁºñÁ†ÅÊñπÂºèËß£ËØªÊñá‰ª∂ÔºåÊñá‰ª∂Êú¨Ë∫´ÁºñÁ†Å‰∏çÊîπÂèò„ÄÇ Convert : ËΩ¨ÂèòÔºåÂ∞ÜÂΩìÂâçÁúãÂà∞ÁöÑÂÜÖÂÆπ‰ª•ÊåáÂÆöÁöÑÁºñÁ†ÅÊñπÂºèÂÜôÂÖ•Âà∞Êñá‰ª∂‰∏≠ÔºåÊñá‰ª∂Êú¨Ë∫´ÁºñÁ†ÅÂèØËÉΩÊîπÂèò„ÄÇ

ÔºåËøôÊòØÊ∑òÂÆùÁöÑÂÅöÁöÑÈïúÂÉè„ÄÇ 12345$ npm install -g cnpm --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org$ sudo cnpm install -g hexo# Êü•ÁúãÁâàÊú¨$ hexo -v ÂàùÂßãÂåñ HexoÂàõÂª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™Êñá‰ª∂Â§πÔºàÂ¶Ç ‰∏äÂàõÂª∫‰∏Ä‰∏™ÊôÆÈÄö‰ªìÂ∫ìÔºå‰ΩÜÊòØË¶ÅÁ¨¶Âêà‰ª•‰∏ãÂëΩÂêçËßÑÂàôÔºö Áî®Êà∑Âêç.github.io „ÄÇ ËØ•‰ªìÂ∫ìÂú∞ÂùÄ‰∏∫Ôºöhttps://github.com/Áî®Êà∑Âêç/Áî®Êà∑Âêç.github.io.git ‰øÆÊîπ Á´ôÁÇπÈÖçÁΩÆÊñá‰ª∂ Âú® Hexo
